In Just Cause, you are a Latin field operative and specialist in regime change backed by top secret US government agency who will overthrow the corrupt government of San Esperito. The rogue South American state is suspected of stockpiling Weapons of Mass Destruction, and it's your mission to negate the threat this poses to world peace. It could be to your advantage that the tropical paradise is about to implode as various factions vie for power - it just needs a gentle nudge in the right direction.
Just Cause offers the freedom to tackle your assignments however you want: playing the island's factions against one another, inciting a rebellion among the masses and building alliances with rebel forces and drug cartels. The action takes place in an incredibly detailed game world which consists of over 250,000 acres of mountains, jungles, beaches, cities and villages. The island can be explored by land, sea and air, as you will have at your disposal one of the most varied and exciting array of vehicles ever seen in a video game.
  • Freeform game-play: approach missions in any way you like, or break off from the fight and enjoy exploring the islands.
  • Over 250K acres of land to explore: the largest environment ever seen in a game!
  • Over-the-top Stunts: jump from vehicle-to-vehicle, parasail, skydive and base-jump...
  • Massive selection of vehicles: over 100 of the most varied, exciting array of land, sea and air vehicles ever seen in a video game.
  • Avalanche Engine™: procedurally generated landscape delivers a huge, beautiful, detailed world while eliminating loading times.
  • Wealth of missions: story missions, side-missions, bonus missions and many more; ensuring plenty of action spread throughout the islands.
  • Support team: Sheldon and Kane, two US government secret agents, will provide you with reconnaissance info, extraction and vehicle drops.
  • Fly: The best way to explore San Esperito is by air!

Dive into an adrenaline-fuelled free-roaming adventure. As agent Rico Rodriguez, your orders are to find and kill your friend and mentor who has disappeared on the island paradise of Panau. There, you must cause maximum chaos by land, sea and air to shift the balance of power. With the unique grapple and parachute combo, BASE jump, hijack and create your own high-speed stunts. With 400 square miles of rugged terrain and hundreds of weapons and vehicles, Just Cause 2 defies gravity and belief.
  • UNIQUE VERTICAL GAMEPLAY - Take to the air like no other game. Experience total aerial freedom with the unique parachute and dual grapple
  • UNBELIEVABLE ADRENALINE-FUELLED STUNTS - Free fall, base jump, vehicle surf, para sail, skydive, grapple, slingshot, leap between vehicles, hang from helicopters, scale buildings. The impossible is within your grasp.
  • UPGRADED DUAL GRAPPLE - Your best tool is now a weapon. Fire two shots with the grapple hook and attach unwilling enemies to high-speed vehicles, hang them upside down from buildings, tether objects in mid air. The possibilities are as vast as your imagination.

關於此遊戲

In KILLING FLOOR 2, players descend into continental Europe where the outbreak caused by Horzine Biotech’s failed experiment has quickly spread and gained unstoppable momentum, essentially paralyzing the European Union— Just one month after the events in the original KILLING FLOOR, the specimen clones are everywhere and civilization is in disarray; communications have failed, governments have collapsed, and military forces have been systematically eradicated. The people of Europe know survival and self-preservation too well and lucky survivors have gone into hiding.

Not all have given up hope though... A group of civilians and mercenaries have banded together to combat the outbreak and established privately funded operation bases across Europe. Upon tracking specimen clone outbreaks, players will descend into zed-laden hot zones and exterminate them.

KEY FEATURES:

• Visceral Gore - KILLING FLOOR 2 ramps up the gore with a proprietary, high powered persistent blood system bringing new levels of fidelity to the genre. Players will send entrails, severed limbs, and blood flying as they wade through hordes of enemies. But they need to watch out! If caught, enemies will rip them, and their entire party limb from limb


• 6 player co-op or solo play— A multitude of varied playable characters await for players to choose from as they enter the fray in online co-op mode or solo mode for those willing to brave the horrific specimens alone


• Versus Survival Game Mode - Be the Zed! A 12 player PvP mode where two teams take turns playing Humans vs. Zeds in a pair of short matches. In the first match, one team plays Humans and the other Zeds until the humans all die during a single round or they beat the boss. For the second match the teams switch sides and when the battle is completed both teams receive a score based on their performance and the higher score wins!


• Terrifying Zeds - New enemies and fan favorites from the original game are back with expanded and smarter artificial intelligence, dishing out powerful attacks, working as a group to weaken the player’s party and pushing the challenge level and fear factor to new levels


• Unique Blend Of Weaponry - From modern militaristic assault rifles, brutal improvised makeshift weapons, classic historical guns, and off the wall “Mad Scientist” weapons, KILLING FLOOR 2 has a unique blend of killing tools that will satisfy any gamer


• Expanded Perk System - Perks from the original game have been reimagined with more added to the fold. All perks now progress with meaningful talent choices that amplify different play styles, giving players a progression path that is expansive and full of rewarding milestones


• Brutal Melee Combat - KILLING FLOOR 2 reinvents melee combat completely. Players now have control over the type of melee attacks they can perform, enabling them to deliver bone-breaking crippling attacks to Zeds


• Zed Time - Be the action hero you know you are! Zed Time returns to Killing Floor 2 better than ever, kicking everything into slow motion giving you that precious time you need to destroy the oncoming horde while watching your weapons at work in glorious high framerate

《英雄大帝》是一款融入了回合戰鬥與角色扮演元素的冒險遊戲。在一個充滿英勇騎士、邪惡巫師、賢明國王與美麗公主的的童話故事奇幻世界中，玩家們將扮演一名英雄。您將能夠帶領角色穿梭於遊戲世界之中來盡情探索、於戰鬥中指揮軍隊、完成各種任務來取得獎賞或是被打得落花流水。

遊戲玩法分為兩大部分：冒險模式與戰鬥模式。遊玩冒險模式時，玩家將實時控制角色。開始新遊戲時便有諸多職業供您選擇，玩家將行走於探索地圖中並尋找各種寶藏、與怪物戰鬥或向當地管事接下並完成任務。一旦進入戰鬥模式，玩家將扮演軍師的角色，帶領部隊進行戰略性回合制戰鬥。戰鬥發生地點可能包含陸地、海洋、地牢、城堡甚至是在一些道具上！英雄自己將不會參與戰鬥，但是他能夠透過法術或召喚生物來協助他的部隊。

Royal Edition

The Royal Edition includes the original Kingdom soundtrack plus 9 brand new tracks for New Lands, composed once again by the talented ToyTree.


Why add Kingdom: New Lands – you say?

Well, it’s an expanded and much improved-on version of the indie hit and IGF nominated Kingdom, originally designed and developed by Noio and Licorice – two awesome independent developers. The game came out on PC late last year and has provided hundreds of thousands of people with a solid way to spend some time in a faraway fantasy land, exploring, discovering and surviving. So, you know… a fun game!


What is the game about?

Good question! One approach to it would we to try to compile some sort of feature list, but what does that really tell you. Another way to address this question is to talk about the emotional journey and experience that Kingdom: New Lands offers.

It is about exploration, discovery, survival and that awesome feeling that you get, when you figure something out, on your own. When multiple pieces all of a sudden come together to form a whole – a basis for a new strategy or an understanding how something in the world of Kingdom: New Lands truly works.

It is about tenacity and overcoming obstacles – even when they seem to be unsurmountable. Pulling through, against all odds. Rebuilding and recovering. And that huge internal high-five when you succeed.

It is about figuring out how best to manage your little Kingdom and tie everything together in a fashion where the game doesn’t play you – you play the game.

It’s also beautiful, tranquil, melancholy, frantic, stressful and wonderful. It delivers a spectrum of emotions that combine into a unique experience.

It's a minimalist strategy game where you need to discover the rules of how the world behaves before you can rule effectively. It's also a little bit whimsical, it's pretty, and it can be frustrating but it won't hold your hand.


But what’s new?

Kingdom: New Lands introduces a lot of new things and builds on the original Kingdom game. It changes the end game significantly. It’s loaded with new elements, new things to discover and explore. It meets a lot of requests for new features, suggested improvements and general feedback from the incredible and wonderful community that has embraced the world of Kingdom and stuck with the game since the launch of the original title – and even further back, when the earliest iteration of Kingdom was a Flash based browser game, enjoyed by an incredible number of people.

So, for anyone that has played Kingdom before, Kingdom: New Lands will introduce many new elements that revitalize the experience. New players will find a bigger, deeper world than the original Kingdom (now called Kingdom: Classic) had to offer.

We hope you try out the game and enjoy playing it, as much as we’ve enjoyed getting it into your hands.


關於此遊戲


Tales spread of far off isles with mysteries waiting to be discovered. Rulers will need all the strength of their subjects to sail away and find new kingdoms in these New Lands.

Kingdom: New Lands builds upon the award-winning gameplay and mystery of Kingdom by introducing an abundance of new content to the IGF-nominated title while maintaining the simplicity and depth that legions of monarchs have come to experience and enjoy. Travel to the New Lands and welcome the deluge of new mounts, merchants, and vagrants that call these isles home, but be wary of the new obstacles that threaten your arrival -- for not just the greedy creatures block your way but even the environment itself can defeat you.

Kingdom: New Lands asks you to puzzle things out on your own. You'll come across items, NPCs, and mysterious statues to help you but you'll have to figure out just how exactly they'll aide you in building and defending your Kingdom.

Kingdom: New Lands features:

Look, we REALLY didn't want to have to give you a feature list... but if you insist...

● One ruler, their horse, and a bag of coins
● Greedy creatures trying to take your coins and crown every night (stop them!)
● Loyal subjects who will help build, attack and defend your Kingdom
● Multiple upgrades for your homestead, different unit types to attack and defend, and secrets littered throughout the land
● Beautiful soundtrack that has received two honorable mentions from the Independent Games Festival

Be brave, ruler, and fight to the bitter end, lest these New Lands conquer you instead.

“Once upon a time, there was a very sad princess. She felt so unloved and unhappy, that everything around her became grey and lifeless and the entire land was deprived of its color and joy. Our fable begins when a single, lonely lantern was lit in a faraway village…”

Be the wind and guide a beautiful sky lantern that spreads the powerful message of everlasting love, by bringing life and color back to the world around you. Enjoy four beautiful Asian-inspired worlds, each with a different theme, nature and architecture. Spread vibrant, happy colors through grey and lifeless lands by flying over them as a red, light-emitting lantern.

The influence of the lantern’s light not only changes the color of the world, but also produces various additional effects, such as turning other lamps on, bringing animals to life, and making windmills start spinning. You’ll ultimately succeed once the kingdom is full of color and happiness has returned to the land.

  • Bring the powerful message of everlasting love to four Asian-inspired worlds
  • Create wonderful lantern festivals by spreading warmth and joy
  • Restful music and peaceful sounds will accompany you on your journey towards happiness
  • Immerse yourself in a relaxing experience, like a virtual coloring book with an aesthetic atmosphere

Valve 最新鉅獻 — Counter-Strike、Half-Life 等遊戲創作團隊再次出擊 — Left 4 Dead 是一款橫跨 PC 與 Xbox 360 平台的遊戲，四位「倖存者」主角必須對抗蜂擁而至的僵屍群與駭人的突變型「魔王感染者」，展開一場絕望的殊死對決。
遊戲背景採用了眾所期待的僵屍末日題材，鋪陳出浩劫餘生的氛圍。L4D 的生存合作遊戲模式，分別以都市和郊區環境為場景的四段「電影」作為故事主軸，在玩家的行動下逐步進展。 每部「電影」都有一項主要的團隊目標，並由五張龐大的地圖所構成，可以供 1 到 4 位人類玩家進行遊戲。

  • 統計、排名、和獎勵系統促使玩家們協力合作進行遊戲。

Features



  • Survival is the most important thing in Legend of Miro. Learn how to adapt and survive in the wild, while trying to get back to your previous life. Try to overcome hunger and cold in order to stay alive.
  • Make sure you choose your allies and your enemies in order to survive and to find out what has happened to you.
  • Decide what is best for you, but choose carefully as you could regret your decisions. There are various decision points that will alter the story according to your choices.
  • Crafting is part of survival in the wild, so learn to craft items in order to stay alive and progress.
  • Mining and Wood cutting will help you get some income that you can use to obtain ingredients, items, weapons, accomodation, food and more. These activities are based on an original system that will make things a lot more interactive. Keep in mind that you have to decide what you spend your money on. Prioritize things so that you do not regret it afterwards.
  • Challenging Quests are part of the storyline, but there are also secondary quests that will help you improve your skills and survivability. Complete over 50 quests as you try to find out what has happened to you and who is responsible about your faith.
  • Complete various mini games such as mazes, quizzes, puzzles and more.
  • Become better at what you do. As you progress, so does James, increasing his survival skills, health, combat skills and more. You will become a better survivor as you complete challenges and quests.
  • Explore large areas that will put your mind to work. Make sure you have proper equipment before you adventure into the caves and mazes. Who knows how long it will take before you find your way out.


Steam Greenlight

Thank you all for voting and helping Legend of Miro to get Greenlit. We appreciate all your help and support!


關於此遊戲



The story puts you in James Sullivan's shoes. A programmer at Red Zone 44 Security Inc. His main job at the company is to develop firewall algorithms to ensure the security of the clients servers. James is fascinated by numerology and has developed an obsession for various numbers and their meaning.

Due to his job, someone decides to change his life forever by forcing him to reconsider his priorities and the important things in his life. Play as James as you try to survive and return to your normal life as a changed person. But what if you can't? Is everything you accomplished gone forever?

Knight's Edition

The Knight's Edition contains Legends of Eisenwald OST in MP3 and FLAC formats and artbook. The last two screenshots above in the carousel are from the arbtook.


關於此遊戲

Legends of Eisenwald is an adventure game with tactical battles, RPG and strategy elements. Take the lead of a small feudal army and try to defend your right to survive in this ruthless medieval world.

The mysterious lands of old Germany are waiting for you - it's a land where the superstitions of the time have come to life. This isn’t a fantasy game. There are no elves or dragons here. There are only people - and their passions, sins and fears that often take a tangible form. Which path will you choose? Live according to your conscience? Or live by power and might? Or will you live by justice? And what is your justice, really?

Game features

  • A unique and dynamic combat system - each move is also an attack
  • The ability to individually equip *each* fighter in your army
  • A large selection of weapons, spells and abilities, including the option to use mounted units
  • Diverse upgrade trees, and each unit level up provides cosmetic changes
  • An intriguing non-linear story
  • A distinctive game world without common fantasy cliches
  • Over 50 hours of gameplay within the game. A main campaign consisting of eight chapters plus two additional scenarios.
  • A beautiful symphonic soundtrack in a medieval style
  • An accompanying Scenario Editor with the full set of developer tools

IMPORTANT NOTICE: Similar to games like Disciples 2 and HOMM, there may be points farther into the game where you lose it all, troops, gold, inventory. All those things you worked so hard for. This is part of the game, not a bug. And you wont know when.... Be warned.

快來加入 Chase 吧！在《樂高®小城：臥底密探》中，控制臥底警察 Chase McCain，追捕惡名昭彰的罪犯 Rex Fury，掃盪由他一手策畫、橫掃全城的犯罪浪潮。在雙人合作模式中，可以和朋友探索《樂高®小城》龐大的開放世界大都市，調查超過 20 個獨特地區、搗獲汽車盜賊團、找出借鑑搞笑電影的內容、駕駛車輛，以及數百件收藏品。《樂高小城：臥底密探》將風趣的原創故事，結合 LEGO 標誌性的幽默感，為所有年齡玩家創造充滿樂趣的體驗。

現在正是時候！在 LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2，和時光旅行者 Kang the Conqueror 一塊迎接全新、原創的冒險，進入不同年代與世界，和你最喜歡的超級英雄與超級惡徒並肩作戰，展開一場場頂尖對決！扮演 Guardians of the Galaxy、Spider-Man、Thor、Hulk、Black Panther、Captain Marvel、Doctor Strange、Green Goblin 和數十位威漫超級英雄與超級惡徒，在這座跨越時光的 Chronopolis 之城展開無限對決！穿越不同的土地 -- 從 Ancient Egypt 到 The Old West、Sakaar和 New York City in 2099 -- 並帶著物品或人物跨越世紀！此外，在新增戰鬥模式中，可以在一系列主題挑戰和戰鬥競技場中，與朋友和家人享受相互對抗的樂趣！

Pre-Purchase LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2!


關於此遊戲

復仇者集結！充滿刺激的超級英雄 LEGO® Marvel 暢銷遊戲系列再度回歸。加入LEGO® Marvel's Avengers，體驗第一個集結賣座電影中的角色和劇情的家用遊戲。化身為最強大的英雄拯救世界吧。

column2: The LEGO® NINJAGO® Movie Video Game
column3: 全新《LEGO 旋風忍者大電影》遊戲帶你找出深藏內心的忍者！扮演你最喜愛的忍著角色 - Lloyd、Jay、Kai、Cole、Zane、Nya 和 Master Wu，保衛旋風忍者的家園，擊敗邪惡魔王 Garmadon 和他的鯊魚軍團。飛簷走壁，高空跳躍，與旋風忍者敵人進行戰鬥，精進你的忍者體術，隨著排名升高，升級忍者戰鬥技巧。只有在《LEGO 旋風忍者大電影》遊戲中，你才有機會體驗電影中的內容，跨越 8 個滿載動作元素的場景，處處都有獨一無二的挑戰道場。借助戰鬥地圖，與好友家人展開對戰，最多支持4人同樂！

column2: LEGO® STAR WARS™: The Force Awakens
column3:

在《樂高® 星際大戰™：原力覺醒™》中，重新體驗只有樂高才能提供之票房冠軍電影中的史詩級事件，將帶來星際大戰宇宙中的嶄新故事內容，探索《星際大戰：絕地大反攻》和《星際大戰：原力覺醒》之間的時代。

《樂高星際大戰：《原力覺醒》介紹了新的遊戲機制，包括玩家可從中選擇多種建築選項來推進遊戲的增強型多建築系統，或首次參與激烈的全新爆破戰鬥，利用周圍環境作為掩護，擊退第一軍團。

預購優惠

在迪士尼-皮克斯的《超人特攻隊》與《超人特攻隊 2》兩部電影充滿樂趣與幽默的 LEGO® 世界中，隨 Parr 一家征服犯罪並兼顧家庭生活，體驗驚心動魄的冒險。


關於此遊戲

在迪士尼-皮克斯的《超人特攻隊》與《超人特攻隊 2》兩部電影充滿樂趣與幽默的 LEGO® 世界中，隨 Parr 一家征服犯罪並兼顧家庭生活，體驗驚心動魄的冒險。《LEGO® 超人特攻隊》讓玩家探索充滿動作場面的劇情關卡，和一個包括 Municiberg 在內的史詩般樞紐世界，同時使用獨特的「超」能力將城裡的超級惡棍繩之以法。玩家還可以在雙人合作中，與家人和朋友組隊，共同搭建不可思議的 LEGO® 積木！

探索，發現，創造。
LEGO® 世界 是無數個程式生成的世界組成的宇宙，一切都是LEGO積木所組成，您可自由控制，並使用各種 LEGO 模型使它們煥發生機。探索每個世界，發現無限可能：如牛仔，長頸鹿、吸血鬼、北極熊、壓路機、賽車、以及巨大的挖土機！使用萬用工具來改變地形，用你的想像力改變世界：將地形升高創造高聳入雲的山脈，或是用積木編輯器來創造任何你能想像出來的物品。您可將作品儲存下來，下次繼續改造。你能在 LEGO Worlds 將奇怪跟有趣的角色，生物，物品與可駕駛的載具使你的世界生機勃勃，然後在裏面體驗獨一無二的冒險經歷。但是最好不要去惹骷髏…
LEGO Worlds 目前仍在搶先體驗階段，所以請您定期回來注意我們的更新以及未來計畫，以及跟我們幕後工作人員進行討論。

在LEGO 世界 中探索，發現無數驚喜
• 在有趣又夢幻的世界尋找隱藏的寶藏
• 讓你的世界充滿自己創作的正派與反派角色。
• 騎乘各種載具與生物，例如挖土機、直升機、馬匹以及飛龍。

創造並設計自己的 LEGO 世界
• 使用積木編輯器或預設的作品出創造任何你能想像的世界。
• 利用萬用工具簡單且快速地修改地形
• 用不同的服裝與選擇設計你的角色
• 玩實際存在的LEGO組合，從經典至現代主題皆有！
• 將作品輸出儲存，下次繼續使用。

擴張你的 LEGO 世界
• 未來遊戲更新中會包括新內容，功能，以及新的LEGO積木組。

關於此遊戲




Episode 1 now FREE!

Life is Strange is an award-winning and critically acclaimed episodic adventure game that allows the player to rewind time and affect the past, present and future.

Follow the story of Max Caulfield, a photography senior who discovers she can rewind time while saving her best friend Chloe Price.
The pair soon find themselves investigating the mysterious disappearance of fellow student Rachel Amber, uncovering a dark side to life in Arcadia Bay. Meanwhile, Max must quickly learn that changing the past can sometimes lead to a devastating future.

Key Features:


  • A beautifully written modern adventure game.
  • Rewind time to change the course of events.
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices you make.
  • Striking, hand-painted visuals.
  • Distinct, licensed indie soundtrack.

關於此遊戲



Life is Strange: Before the Storm is a new three part; standalone adventure set three years before the first game in the BAFTA award-winning franchise.

You play as sixteen-year old Chloe Price who forms an unlikely friendship with Rachel Amber, a beautiful and popular girl destined for success.

When Rachel learns a secret about her family that threatens to destroy her world, it is her newfound friendship with Chloe that gives her the strength to carry on.

No longer alone the girls must confront each other's demons and together, find a way to overcome them.

KEY FEATURES:
  • Choice and consequence driven narrative adventure
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices you make
  • ‘Backtalk’ - A risk/reward conversation mode that allows Chloe to use her barbed tongue to provoke or get her way
  • Make your mark on the world with witty tags and drawings
  • Choose Chloe’s outfit and see how people react to your look
  • Distinct Licensed indie soundtrack & original score by Daughter

《光的追迹者》是一款VR平台解謎遊戲，玩家在其中扮演神的角色，指引絕望中的公主攀上巨大的Bellbatis塔。



用你的雙手指引公主越過敵人和重重阻礙，在這個世界中隨心而動，並與之互動。唯有別出心裁，思想清晰和視野開闊，才能指引公主到達最終目的地。



• 平台遊戲遇上PS VR：全新的設備，全新的創意，將會帶給玩家全新的體驗。
• Light Tracer的奇幻世界：8個章節，8個世界：從重力到機械，從在冰雪世界滑行，到最終邁入天使之城。
• 挑戰無限，變化無窮：從經典的平台遊戲到高深的謎題，再到boss大戰，考驗的不只是你的反應速度，還有解謎速度。
• 全新的視角：使用手柄“抓取”世界，從而自由移動視角。有時候，視角的改變，恰恰就是克服眼前困境的關鍵所在。
• 塔與謎題：背負重任的公主，神秘莫測玩家，再加上跌宕起伏的故事！一路過關斬將，探索這個奇幻世界背後的奧秘。

雷光歸來為 FINAL FANTASY XIII 系列的完結篇，描寫主角雷光最後奮戰的角色扮演遊戲。遊戲包含了全新的世界設定、加強動作表現的華麗戰鬥場面、隨心所欲的個人化自訂要素等等。敬請期待本系列三部曲的精彩完結篇。

INCLUDES

關於此遊戲



置身於黑暗風格的異想故事──Little Nightmares的世界中，面對屬於你的兒時夢魘！貪顎號──是艘巨大又神祕的船隻，盤踞其中的腐敗靈魂正打算飽餐一頓，快幫助小六從中脫逃吧。
在慢慢探索後就會發覺，這令人膽顫心驚的未知環境，不僅只有要逃離的監獄，還有許多可以挖掘祕密的場所。
重新找回你的童心，解放想像力，找尋出口吧！

你是否經常夢想著操作大型裝載起重機和駕駛大馬力物流車輛在物流樞紐間運輸超重貨物？



作為“物流公司”的碼頭工人，要靠你搬運成千上萬噸的貨物和商品，並確保它們能按時發出！在主要物流樞紐建造你自己的小倉庫，然後通過新建貨運終點站一點一點地擴建它。

操縱大馬力正面吊運機和高度驚人的起重機將貨物裝載到火車、卡車和輪船上。在倉庫中來回調動叉車。只有努力工作、巧妙計畫，你才能成為主要的物流服務提供者！

Features:



  • 模擬管理工作
  • 建造你自己的物流公司，掙到足夠的前來擴建你的公司並購買新車輛
  • 自行操縱一切大馬力車輛和起重機來裝載貨物：叉車、集裝箱堆高機、跨車、橋式起重機和港口起重機
  • 擴建你的公司，通過建造停車場、倉庫和港口，以便你能否接受更大的訂單
  • 完成難度大但利潤豐厚的訂單，通過小心搬運易碎貨物或在指定期限內裝載集裝箱
  • 行事機靈，講求策略，及時機敏地裝載集裝箱
  • 學習有聲 3D 動畫導師的經驗（英語/德語），他會向你傳授碼頭工作的秘訣

在遠古的時代，世界萬物皆由邪神統管。在邪神的統治下，祂奴役了所有的人類，但是在大崛起時代開始時，為了爭取自由的戰鬥開始後，反抗者們心中的恐懼紛紛轉變為憤怒。在一場光榮的勝利之後，墮落邪神被逐出，而人們則建立了一個新秩序……那是一個罪無可恕的世界，犯罪者也沒有贖罪自新的選擇。
在千年之後，烙枷惡魔軍團從黑暗的國度中重返，人們因為恐懼而顫抖，惡魔們渴求無辜純潔的靈魂。人類在手足無措的情況下，只好求助於一名不太有守護者氣質的男子。這個男子名為哈爾金，他因為犯罪而遭到驅趕，因為不見容於社會，故過著見不得光的生活。現在，他和導師卡斯洛一同踏上旅途，前往黑暗之源……並面對墮落邪神。
投身加入這個快節奏的角色扮演遊戲，感受複雜而且豐富的戰鬥系統，所有的武器、鎧甲與技能都會直接影響敵人的速度與攻擊……如果這些都沒辦法產生效果，還能用禁忌的魔法力量來毀滅你的敵人。

遊戲特色：


  • 踏上人類與惡魔世界對抗的史詩及探索之旅
  • 對抗強大的烙枷惡魔大軍的領主與麾下的將領
  • 探索黑暗風格的奇幻世界
  • 仔細做出足以影響命運的選擇
  • 從多樣化的裝備中選用傳說武器和裝甲
  • 選擇你的職業：戰士、祭司或是盜賊，並自由調度你的技能與武器

與下世代備受推崇的動作格鬥遊戲系列之Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite一起回到兩個故事世界之歷史性衝擊。面對此史無前例的衝擊，立即選擇Marvel與Capcom兩個世界內的英雄人物聯合出動對抗吧！

由兩間公司共同想像和創作，Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite包括各種各樣刺激而又容易應付的單人遊戲模式和豐富的多人遊戲內容，務求同時得到新玩家和忠實粉絲們的喜愛。訓練及任務模式包括令人驚嘆的畫面和身歷其景的電影故事模式，帶領玩家置身於兩個世界中對抗新的威脅—Ultron Sigma。

遊戲特點

  • 為重生對抗：兩個宇宙在這個全新的交叉時代再次相撞，玩家們挑選他們喜愛的Marvel及Capcom角色，加入容易應付和自由形式的2v2戰鬥團隊，這是前所未有的新遊戲動態。
  • 無限力量：在6款Marvel世界全能的寶石中挑選一款，這將會影響對戰的結果。每款寶石會因著不同角色擁有獨特的能力，其龐大的力量足以扭轉局面。
  • 標誌性英雄：除了Captain Marvel、Iron Man、Captain America、Ryu、Mega Man X以及Morrigan，更多的角色將加入團隊，包括Hulk、Hawkeye、Rocket Raccon、Chun-Li、Strider Hiryu、Chris Redfield和Ultron，將來更會不斷的追加角色。
  • 電影般故事情節：Marvel和Capcom世界的相撞促使英雄和惡棍們一起戰鬥，將合併後的世界從一個險惡的新威脅-Ultron Sigma中拯救出來。兩個分別來自Marvel宇宙和Capcom宇宙的機器敵人—Ultron和Sigma聯手，這個邪惡組合著迷於用病毒來感染所有的有機生命體。歷史上的戰士們現在必須聚集團結一致對抗Ultron Sigma，拯救他們新成立的世界。
  • 容易應付的單人遊戲內容：除了體驗電影般的故事情節，玩家可於容易應付的單人遊戲模式內的一連串訓練、任務及街機模式中不斷提昇自己的技術。
  • 大量多玩家特點：強大的線上模式和內容包括排名及一般遊戲、全球排行榜、觀眾模式之線上大廳均能帶給玩家更多的體驗。

關於此遊戲

Two stories, two main characters, one epic experience: in Memoria, players travel through different time periods, while following two distinct protagonists: Sadja, a southern princess who wants to be a war hero, and Geron, a bird catcher who wants to lift a curse from his girlfriend. The game combines point & click gameplay with unique magic skills.

Sadja, a Southern princess, has an unstoppable desire to become the greatest hero in history – by joining and succeeding in the biggest war Aventuria has ever seen: The war of the Mages, fought in the middle of an uninhabitable desert.
Bird catcher Geron lives almost 450 years after the Great War. Geron’s eternal love, Nuri, has been turned into a crow by an evil curse. To give her back her human form, Geron needs the help of the mysterious merchant Fahi, who has magical powers. But Fahi is only willing to help Geron if he agrees to solve a puzzle which Fahi has seen in his dreams. The quest for answers soon leads to a chain of events that connects both Sadja's and Geron's stories, threatening to turn the present into a grim reflection of a long forgotten past.

Memoria combines classic point & click adventure gameplay with the features of The Dark Eye, one of the most successful RPG universes known in the fantasy world. Point & click adventure game puzzles get a unique twist by adding magical features – and a wise, talking staff. Over eight chapters, players control both Sadja’s and Geron’s fates, involuntarily interacting with each other and bridging over 500 years of time. Each chapter in Memoria features opulent graphics, epic locations, a thrilling fantasy crime story and a unique puzzle design that differs from chapter to chapter.

Key Features


  • Epic fantasy soundtrack and high quality voiceover to draw you deep into the game
  • Dive into the world of The Dark Eye, and explore mystical places such as Draconia, an ancient temple built by dragons
  • Follow the story of two unique characters through two different time periods
  • Beautifully hand-drawn 2D backgrounds and high quality 3D game characters
  • From the creator of The Dark Eye: Chains of Satinav, The Whispered World and Deponia

經典微型賽車為了讓微型賽車粉絲們更能享受賽車的樂趣，新增了淘汰模式！透過達到新的里程碑及贏得勝利，來獲得各式各樣的武器、互動性高的賽道及特殊造型！

全新的競速模式：提供最多可12人同時遊玩的多人模式，讓你體驗不同於單人遊玩無法獲得的成就感！

多人遊玩：透過團隊合作一起打倒敵人吧！

在線與離線的多人遊玩：有著排行榜、一般挑戰/比賽、賽季、遊玩名單、分階遊玩等各種項目！

column2: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition
column3:
特價優惠


關於此遊戲

在世界上最受欢迎的飞行模拟器中飞向天空！

屡获殊荣的微软模拟飞行X首次登陆Steam。从世界上任何地方起飞，执飞在世界上最具代表性的飞机前往24000个目的地中的任何一个。Steam版微软模拟飞行X已经更新了多人游戏和Windows 8.1支持。

操控各种飞机，如747大型喷气式客机、F/A-18大黄蜂、P-51D野马、EH-101直升机等等——每种飞行和冒险都有合适的飞机。选择你的出发地，设置时间、季节和天气。从超过24000个机场中的一个起飞，探索航空之美的世界，它已经让全球数以百万计的飞机迷们痴迷。

FSX Steam版为玩家提供了一个互连的世界，他们在这里可以选择他们的角色，从空中交通管制员到机长或副机长。竞速模式可以让你和朋友通过四种类型的比赛一争高下，其中包括红牛飞行赛道、无限制的雷诺全国冠军赛道，以及越野、竞速滑翔机赛道和Hoop与Jet峡谷等假想赛道。通过三种不同的难度级别来检验你的技巧，从简单的标塔赛到各种天气条件下不同赛道上极具挑战性的比赛。

共有超过80项任务，考验你的实力来获得奖励。你可以尝试搜索和救援、试飞员、航母作战等。跟踪你的每项任务如何完成，提高你的技能水平，直到准备好迎接下一个挑战。

FSX Steam版让飞行员驾驶自己梦想的飞机，从德哈维兰DHC-2海狸水上飞机和格鲁曼G-21A鹅式飞机到AirCreation 582SL超轻型机和马乌莱M7猎户座带轮和雪橇的飞机。使用FSX附加组件充实你的飞机系列，提高你的世界的真实性。

AI控制的登机桥、燃料车和移动行李推车的加入，为繁忙机场的飞行体验增添了额外的真实感。

无论你想挑战你的朋友来一场惊心动魄的比赛，还是仅仅想欣赏美景，FSX Steam版都将会使你沉浸在一个充满活力的生动世界，将逼真的飞行体验带到你的家里。

下载大小：16.4GB

请注意

微软模拟飞行X：Steam版（FSX：Steam版）的功能与盒装版微软模拟飞行X（MSFSX）类似。我们与第三方开发者广泛的合作，以确保这两种产品可以同时运行，但是由于MSFSX有各种各样的可用附加产品，我们不能保证你的现有内容可与微软模拟飞行X Steam版同时运行。

Flight Simulator X软件开发工具包（SDK）中不包含在FSX中：Steam版。

如果您已经在PC上安装了MSFSX，并担心两款游戏相互之间的同时运行，你可考虑安装FSX：单独PC上的Steam版。

如果你已经安装MSFSX和附加组件，它们将只能通过现有的安装访问。它们不会跨模拟器原来的版本和Steam版复制。

column3: Torvin和Talion一起獵殺了最狂野的魔多怪獸，使他們成為反抗沙龍軍隊的中堅力量。獵殺新的野獸，發現新巢穴，獲得獨特的符文，控制致命的怪獸，使它們成為自己的傀儡。解鎖專屬的[野獸獵人]皮膚和[野外試煉]挑戰模式。此內容包含在[中土世界：魔多之影]通行證中。請勿重複購買。 需要[中土 世界：魔多之影]；單獨出售。

《魔法門：英雄之戰》〈Might & Magic Clash of Heroes〉發生在《英雄無敵 5》的 40 年前。分散在亞山〈Ashan〉大陸五個不同的區域，五位特別的英雄們必須跨越他們各自艱難的旅途來讓力量成長，揭穿惡魔的陰謀並且在最後從混沌中拯救世界。

主要特色：

  • 掌握獨特的動態戰鬥機制
    • 策略的藝術： 編組攻擊性或是防禦性的部隊排列，學習連鎖技巧並善用您的英雄魔法與神器來建立一個良好的戰術並且戰勝您的敵人。
    • 各種挑戰： 在一般的戰役中，橫越敵方的部隊打倒敵方英雄。進行特殊挑戰與 Boss 戰，您的策略與技巧將受到嚴峻的考驗。在解決謎題戰役中，找出正確的連鎖方式，在一回合內殲滅所有的敵人。
    • 部隊管理： 賺取資源並雇用不同屬性和能力的部隊來創建您最強的軍隊陣容。
    • 英雄崛起： 變得越來越強大，每場戰役後所獲得的經驗值讓您的英雄與部隊等級提升。
    • 高畫質圖像、音樂與音效： 享受豐富的魔法門世界。
  • 經歷一場史詩冒險：
    • 鮮明的詳細設定： 探索充滿騎士、精靈、巫師、死靈法師和惡魔的詳盡地圖，並與風格獨特的漫畫式環境互動。
    • 魔法門 ® 英雄無敵 ® 前傳： 體驗五位主要英雄：Anwen、Godric、Fiona、Aidan 和 Nadia 的童年。
    • 橫越亞山的幻想世界： 雇用並升級部隊，找尋隱藏的神器以建立最強大的軍隊。
  • 透過 Steam™ 好友進行 1 對 1 的線上 PVP 模式、兩人共同合作的 2 對 2 線上 PVP 模式
    • 數個英雄： 從 10 個不同的角色中選擇，每一個英雄都有獨特的魔法與能力。
    • 建立您自己的軍隊： 搭配出最佳的部隊陣容與神器，讓您在在戰場上取得最大的優勢。
    • 邀請一個好友跟您組隊去迎戰兩個敵人，進行一場動態與策略合作的戰役。

一種神祕病毒席捲了世界，所有機械化生物都變得瘋狂無比。在遊戲中，你將扮演 Beck，他是無敵機器人戰隊中的九號，也是唯一對這種病毒有免疫力的機器人。奔跑、跳躍、實施爆炸、變形，使用從敵人那裡盜來的能力，一路通過 12 個極具挑戰的關卡，擊敗強大的「無敵戰隊」機器人，並與威脅整個行星的邪惡勢力作戰！

遊戲特色：


經典的 2D 動作遊戲轉換：對戰 8 位機器人同胞，擊敗他們後解鎖變形能力，從而獲得獨特技能！

雙人玩家機械破壞：和好友一起，以 Beck 及其拍檔 Call 的身份執行線上任務；使用他們的獨特能量協力作戰、克服障礙；或者在線上競速戰中對抗彼此！

額外的遊戲模式：大怪計時戰模式！數十個小任務和挑戰！可切換的 8 位元音軌！2 個額外的可解鎖困難模式！

向全世界展示你有能力：使用 Beck 的技能組成連擊，並贏取超棒的 S 等級、高分以及排行榜排名！

column2: Minecraft: Story Mode - A Telltale Games Series
column3:
Play Episode One Free


關於此遊戲

Episode 1 is now FREE - for a limited time!

THE ADVENTURE OF A LIFETIME IN THE WORLD OF MINECRAFT

In this five part episodic series, you’ll embark on a perilous adventure across the Overworld, through the Nether, to the End, and beyond. You and your friends revere the legendary Order of the Stone: Warrior, Redstone Engineer, Griefer, and Architect; slayers of the Ender Dragon. While at EnderCon in hopes of meeting Gabriel the Warrior, you and your friends discover that something is wrong… something dreadful. Terror is unleashed, and you must set out on a quest to find The Order of the Stone if you are to save your world from oblivion.

Key Features

  • Created by award-winning adventure game powerhouse Telltale Games, in partnership with Minecraft creators, Mojang
  • Featuring the voices of Patton Oswalt (Ratatouille, Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D), Brian Posehn (The Sarah Silverman Program, Mission Hill), Ashley Johnson (The Last of Us, Tales from the Borderlands), Scott Porter (Friday Night Lights, X-Men), Martha Plimpton (The Goonies, Raising Hope), Dave Fennoy (The Walking Dead: A Telltale Games Series, Batman: Arkham Knight), Corey Feldman (The Goonies, Stand by Me), Billy West (Futurama, Adventure Time), and Paul Reubens (Tron: Uprising, Pee-Wee’s Playhouse)
  • You will drive the story through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action will make this YOUR story

在 Mini Metro 中，你將肩負起在飛速發展的城市中涉及地鐵的重要任務。城市最初只有三個地鐵站，在此基礎上，你需要建立新的地鐵站，並在地鐵站之間設計線路，讓上下班的通勤者們在路上少花時間。每個地鐵站能容納的等車乘客數量是有限的，所以你的地鐵網路必須設計精密，避免發生擁堵和旅行延誤的情況。



城市在不斷擴張的進程中，需要更多的地鐵站，以幫助更多的通勤乘客。對地鐵網路的要求也會越來越高。你需要經常重新規劃線路，使運輸效率最大化。你每週獲得的新資源都對建設有所幫助，但你得決定如何分配。

大多數的地鐵方案都會以失敗告終。也許地鐵站建設的太快了，也許大量乘客滯留在了月臺上。你的地鐵線路能維持多長時間運營呢？

主要功能

遊戲
  • 既緊張又輕鬆，既複雜又簡單。這怎麼可能呢？你自己來玩玩看就知道了。
  • 三種遊戲模式：快速得分的正常模式、沒有限制的無盡模式、挑戰自我的極限模式。
  • 在 18 座全球知名城市中涉及地鐵線路：倫敦、紐約、巴黎、柏林、墨爾本、香港、大阪、聖彼德堡、蒙特婁、三藩市、聖保羅、首爾、華盛頓特區、開羅、伊斯坦堡、上海、孟買、奧克蘭。每座城市都有獨特的主題、特定的困難以及當地的風格。
  • 城市發展具有隨機性。每個遊戲都不一樣。上一個遊戲中成功的戰略在新的遊戲中可能就沒什麼用了。
  • 每張地圖都是大師之作，你可以達到倫敦地鐵之父哈利·貝克那樣的水準。你可隨心所欲的調整地鐵方案，還可把你的傑作作為電腦桌面！
  • 來自 Disasterpeace 的配樂
  • 提供夜間模式和色盲模式
  • 還有超酷的列車！

遊戲演示

你可在下方地址瞭解 Mini Metro 並試玩倫敦地圖：
遊戲演示

誰是下一個？體驗新一代的頂級格鬥運動。

真人快打X在全新的遊戲體驗中融入了空前的、電影特效。真人快打X首次使玩家能夠從每個影響策略和戰鬥風格的不同角色變化中進行選擇。

傳奇戰士Goro將作為增值禮包提供。

數位豪華版



The deluxe edition includes the game and the Season Pass.

The Moto Racer 4 season pass gives you access to 3 big upcoming DLC packs, including an additional game mode.

With the season pass, show what you're made of online or off with three free customization packs.

Each pack contains:
- 1 Rider
- 2 New bikes
- 2 Horns
- 1 Emblem


關於此遊戲

OVERVIEW:



In a world where freestyle and risk-taking dominate, impose your riding style all around the world. Impress your opponents and win races with class!

Moto Racer 4 is racing game you can play on asphalt or dirt in single or multiplayer mode (up to ten players).

Master drifting, wheelies, sharp turns and other techniques to earn a place on the podium!

Customize and upgrade your bike! Progress through Moto Racer 4 and take in the stunning environments.
From the United States to the Asia by way of the desert, Moto Racer 4 takes you through perilous, breathtaking courses at 100 miles an hour.

Obstacles, hell-bent opponents, traffic and even police will get in your way to try to stop you. Go off road and use each course's unique features to your advantage to find the best shortcuts.

KEY FEATURES :



  • 1 GAME, 2 CATEGORIES: ASPHALT & DIRT

  • EVEN MORE CHALLENGES - In Progression mode, advance through the game and complete challenges to unlock even more content!

  • IMPRESSIVE, VARIED ENVIRONMENTS - From the Bay Area to the Asia by way of the desert, become the freestyle king by stringing together tricks on the most unlikely of terrains.

  • CUSTOMIZABLE BIKES - Customize your bike however you like to reflect your unique style.

  • CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS - Face your friends on split screen or on line in multiplayer mode with up to 10 players at one time!

準備好迎接 2017 MotoGP™ 帶來的飆速快感！
網羅官方錦標賽中所有摩托車、車隊和賽道，讓您享受一場極限娛樂饗宴。
嘗試全新的「管理生涯模式」，扮演車隊經理，努力在競賽時與賽前賽後做出正確的選擇。

成為 MotoGP™ 2018 賽季的新星！從 Red Bull MotoGP™ Rookies Cup 到最高級的 MotoGP™，追尋作為專業騎手的職業生涯。
在包括泰國 Buriram International Circuit 在內的 19 條官方賽道上，與所有 MotoGP™ 車手同場競技，全新特性和新版 MotoGP™ eSport Championship 將為您帶來更具沉浸感的體驗。。
體驗職業車手生涯，決定自己座駕的提昇方式瞭解掌控輪胎磨損的方法，並使用 MotoGP™ ID 監控自己的進展。而透過旁觀模式的全新多視角，對好友比賽的觀摩從未如此簡單。

Endurance Series DLC and free Anniversary Update out now.


關於此遊戲




  • 賽車迷的終極管理遊戲。
  • 感受賽車日的緊張刺激。根據現況即時反應，當機立斷，超前對手取得優勢。
  • 掌握先進科技，自訂賽車的所有性能細節。

關於此遊戲

FEATURES

威震鄰里（RUN THE NEIGHBORHOOD）
  • 見證運動生涯模式的未來：讓您隨心所欲地玩遊戲。透過NBA比賽建立起您的籃球生涯、到運動場的籃 球場打球、加入業餘職業混合賽，或是在全新開放的鄰里設定中到各大商店與場所一探究竟。另有全新 的MYPLAYER升級與代言系統、包含NBA球員的至今最龐大角色陣容，以及其他更多精彩特色。
邁向99（ROAD TO 99）
  • 包羅萬象的小遊戲，獎勵玩家提高他們MYPLAYER的整體評價，無論他們選擇玩何種模式。提供了橫跨 「職業業餘混合賽」、「公園模式」以及您在MYCAREER裡的NBA旅程的統一證章系統。在您邁向99 整體評價的過程中，您的屬性、動作（動畫）和證章將定義您的打球風格。
更棒的「創造球員」
  • 您可以用MYNBA2K18行動裝置應用程式掃描您的臉孔，或是使用我們提供的預設選項進行各種自訂，創造出您想要的MYPLAYER。髮型部份已經過更新，現在提供眾多可供挑選的新選項，體重和身高也將 更精確地呈現，以反映出您希望的MYPLAYER獨特外表。
MYTEAM
  • 收集球員卡片，包括過去與現在的NBA傳奇球員，然後在各種線上與離線模式中與其他玩家較量。
SUPER MAX
  • 在這全新的賽季模式中，組織一支有薪資上限的球隊，並對抗實力相當的其他玩家。由於必須在有限的 薪資上限範圍內挑選13名球員，您得在每回合裡策略性地挑選您的球隊陣容。依據您每回合的表現會頒 給獎勵，因此每場比賽都非常重要。
卡片包與季後賽 (PACK & PLAYOFFS)
  • 這個全新的徵召模式，挑戰玩家利用每回合開始前開啟的卡牌包來組織最強的5人隊伍。對抗其他玩家的 徵召隊伍並晉級可獲得更棒的獎勵。「卡片包與季後賽」讓玩家每回合都能組織新的隊伍陣容以及獲得 全新遊戲體驗。
賽程挑戰 (SCHEDULE CHALLENGES)
  • 30支NBA球隊各有30場比賽的賽程，而您將可全程參與。只要通過這些依據2017-18 NBA賽程所安排 的900場獨特考驗，您就可以獲得MyTEAM點數與獎勵。

優秀的遊戲機制

全新動作系統
  • 全新的動作系統讓玩家不但可以全權操控球員，還可獲得極高的真實感。現在，運球和無球動作不再是 動畫趨向。這項突破性的技術能動態地產生動畫以提供最棒的遊戲體驗。現在一切操之在您。
改良過的投籃量表
改良過得投籃量表能讓球員更連貫地投籃命中。多種回饋資訊（數值）讓玩家能更精準地拿捏出手時機。[/list]

遊戲畫面與呈現

更棒的球員精細度
  • 開發團隊投入了無數小時的時間，只為了讓每一位NBA球員看起來及感覺起來與他們在現實世界中的本 尊無異，而且就連最小的細節也不放過，例如疤痕、生長紋、退色的刺青等等。球員軀體系統已經過重 新設計，以便能精確地重現聯盟裡每位球員的體格。另外，也從無到有重建了所有球員的臉孔，好更細 膩地呈現更多細節，以及更逼真地呈現光影效果。
雷射掃描球衣與配件（飾品）
  • 30支NBA球隊的雷射掃描球衣精確地呈現了每件球衣的設計，就連最細小的縫線痕跡都不放過。運用「真實色彩」技術，讓各隊球衣的色彩前所未見的純淨寫實，並讓白色雪白亮眼。搭配上改頭換面的球員 軀體系統，球衣在各種體型上皆服服貼貼。為了讓球員在球場上更加帥氣有型，玩家還可以看到《NBA
    2K》史上數量最多的掃描球鞋和配件（飾品）。
特別來賓評述
  • 運動電玩史上最堅強的播報陣容，現在比過去更加壯大。未來的名人堂球星與曾任《NBA 2K》封面球員 的Kobe Bryant與Kevin Garnett拿出自己的專才加入了播報的輪替行列，使得遊戲中的播報員總數達到 13人。

傳奇球隊

全時制霸陣容
  • 所有30支球隊的NBA史上最出色球員，首次組成了各隊的全時制霸陣容。在「快速比賽」中讓各隊的全 時制霸陣容互相較量，看看誰才是最強的，或是在MyTEAM的「全時制霸」模式中挑戰所有30支球隊的 全時制霸陣容。
經典球隊
  • 《NBA 2K18》收錄了過去最出色的62支NBA球隊，包括17支新加入的球隊。讓您最喜愛的經典球隊對 抗現役NBA球隊，或是重現精彩萬分的總冠軍賽，或者瞧瞧Shaq和Kobe能否匹敵過去最強的湖人球隊 ，或是讓97-98公牛隊與15-16勇士隊一分高下。可能性無窮無盡。

MYGM/MYLEAGUE

MYGM: 下一章
  • 我們首開運動遊戲先河，讓MyGM帶來敘事趨向、有故事情節的球隊體驗，並且保留了多年來廣受喜愛 的玩家控制與球隊組建要素。您在故事中許多關鍵時刻做出的選擇和提供的答案，將會決定劇情的發展 路線。創造您自己的故事，打造出冠軍球隊！
MYLEAGUE
  • 2K深受玩家喜愛的球隊模式可讓玩家完全自訂他們的聯賽。挑選比賽場數和球隊數量，調整聯賽設定，以及套用您自訂的設定至單一賽季、複數賽季或線上體驗。或者，您可以跳過正規賽季直接開始季後賽。
忠於現實的聯賽架構與規則
  • MyGM和MyLEAGUE都做了許多更新，好符合現實中的NBA規則，包括許多來自最新集體談判協議中 的規則。與每位球員協商出最適合您球隊的球員合約，包括適用優秀球員的超級頂級合約與「大鳥資格 」合約、適用年長球員的38歲規則合約，以及適用年輕球員的雙向合約。您可以在釋出球員時使用「延 期支付條款」把薪資上限降至最低，或是讓年輕球員到G聯賽磨練磨練，或將將他們放養在海外。

關於此遊戲

替運動遊戲重下定義的《NBA 2K》即將踏入第20個年頭。一路走來，《NBA 2K》不僅提供最為出色的畫面與遊戲表現，也帶來各種創新的遊戲模式，以及足可亂真的開放世界「街區」。《NBA 2K19》將持續挑戰遊戲設計的極限，務求讓玩家獲得更接近現實的精彩籃球體驗與街頭文化。

《Nex Machina》由Housemarque製作，這款街機風格的雙搖桿射擊遊戲緊湊激烈，遊戲方式承襲自《Robotron》和《Smash TV》，將背景設定在遙遠的機械科幻（cablepunk）未來，並主打全然動作打鬥、立體像素破壞和玩家競爭元素。




在《Nex Machina》的世界裡，人類過度依賴科技，視線一刻都無法離開手上的智慧型裝置。於此同時，機器已發展出自我意識，具備超過人類十倍的智能。既然機器已經蛻變成更高等的生命型態，何必再低聲下氣為人類服務呢？為了證明這一點，機器開始全面抹滅人類……

《Resogun》的製作商Housemarque和遊戲設計師Eugene Jarvis邀請你回到街機年代，暢玩本世代的雙搖桿射擊遊戲《Nex Machina》。摧毀邪惡機器人、解救無辜人類，並壓過好友的高分紀錄，粉碎他們成功的夢想。你能一路登峰造極，奪得最高頭銜嗎？

-最精彩刺激的街機風格雙搖桿射擊遊戲

-運用Housemarque引擎、由立體像素驅動的驚艷重製版本

column2: Ni no Kuni™ II: Revenant Kingdom

9/10
NI NO KUNI 2 IS THE FULL PACKAGE, TYING TOGETHER A WIDE VARIETY OF DIFFERENT GAMEPLAY STYLES


關於此遊戲



欢迎来到 Ni no Kuni™ II的世界。
在国家遭遇政权叛变之后，年轻的国王Evan为自己立下了艰难的使命，寻找建立新的国度，将国家团结起来、拯救人民逃离恶魔之手。
加入他一起参与这令人难忘的冒险旅程，像动画又像游戏令人难以分辨的界限。Ni no Kuni II是由 LEVEL-5开发，传说级的美术家Yoshiyuki Momose(百濑 义行)担任角色设计，游戏配乐即是由享誉国际的Joe Hisaishi(久石 让)担当。

Upon completion of these quests, players can earn various rewards including new costumes from NieR: Replicant, new equipment and cosmetic accessories such as masks, hairspray that change the color of your character, records that add special music tracks to the players’ jukebox and much more!

關於此遊戲


NieR: Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 and their battle to reclaim the machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful machines.

Humanity has been driven from the Earth by mechanical beings from another world. In a final effort to take back the planet, the human resistance sends a force of android soldiers to destroy the invaders. Now, a war between machines and androids rages on... A war that could soon unveil a long-forgotten truth of the world.

Key Features:
  • Action-Packed Battles – Players will switch between using melee and ranged attacks in battle against hordes of enemies and challenging bosses across a variety of open field maps. The tight controls and incredibly fluid combat are simple to learn for newcomers while offering plenty of depth for more experienced action gamers. Players can perform high-speed battle actions—combining light and heavy attacks—and switch through an arsenal of weaponry while evading enemies with speed and style.
  • Beautifully Desolate Open-World – The game seamlessly joins together hauntingly beautiful vistas and locations with no area loading. The environments are rendered in 60fps and contain a wealth of sub-events in addition to the main storyline.
  • Masterfully Crafted Story and Characters – NieR: Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 and their ferocious battle to reclaim a machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful weapons known as machine lifeforms.
  • Elements of an RPG – Players will obtain a variety of weapon types, level up in battle, learn new combat skills, and customise a loadout that caters to their playstyle.
  • Utilise the Pod Support System to Assist In and Outside of Battle – Pods can attack the enemy in both manual and lock-on modes. They can also assist outside of battle, such as allowing the player to glide through the air. Pods can be enhanced throughout the game, with upgrades including new attack methods and variations.
  • “Auto Mode” Available for Beginners – Novice players can elect “Auto Mode” for easy attacks and evasions.

column2: Nioh: Complete Edition / 仁王 Complete Edition
column3:
這款黑暗風格的戰國動作RPG以賊人囂張跋扈，妖怪們四處蠢動的幽玄日本戰國時代為舞台，並以史實人物「三浦按針」為藍本創造出金髮碧眼武士「威廉」，描寫他歷經幾番死鬥的故事。
本作除了以戰國時代末期的史實為基礎，有著許多實際存在的戰國武將登場，故事原創又深奧札實，也將是能夠提供充分的緊張感與極高的成就感，足以稱之為「戰國殊死遊戲」的作品。

■收錄內容
除了本篇的「九州篇」～「近江篇」外，還完整收錄了「東北之龍」、「義之繼承者」與「元和偃武」等三大DLC。

◆「東北之龍」（東北篇）
　追加劇情以東北為舞台，追查被稱為獨眼龍的「伊達政宗」涉嫌謀反的真相。

　◆「義之繼承者」（大坂之役・冬篇）
　舞台是大坂冬之陣。
　描繪人稱日本第一兵的戰國時代猛將「真田幸村」的故事。

　◆「元和偃武」（大坂之役・夏篇）
　舞台為大坂夏之陣。
　以德川和豐臣兩家所引發的戰國最後大戰和威廉的旅途終點為題材的故事。

■關於Steam版限定特典
可獲得Steam版限定的特典裝備「調節閥前立頭盔」。
在遊戲中前往「神社」，可從「賞賜」選單中領取。

關於此遊戲

What would you do if your fears were hacked? >observer_ is a cyberpunk horror game from Bloober Team, the creators of Layers of Fear. Discover a dark cyberpunk world beset by plagues, war and squalor. Play as the new front line of neural police as you hack into the jagged minds of the insane.

Features:

  • Observe and Report - You are Dan Lazarski, an elite neural detective known as an Observer, and part of a corporate-funded police unit whose purpose is to hack and invade suspects’ minds. In this future, anything you think, feel, or remember can be used against you in a court of law.

  • A Dark Dystopia - The year is 2084. If you somehow survived the Nanophage, odds are you were killed in the War. Those who live have turned to drugs, VR, neural implants— anything to distract themselves from this new reality. But they can’t hide from you.

  • Interactive Insanity - As you hack into the unstable minds of criminals and victims to look for clues, you will relive their darkest fears, forcing you to question your own reality -- and your sanity.

  • A New Horror from the Creators of Layers of Fear - The largest and most frightening world yet from Bloober Team! Lose yourself -- and your sanity -- in the dark dystopia that is 2084. >observer_ is a horror experience meant for mature audiences. What you see will disturb you.

Control Help and Tips

Struggling with Abe and the controls?


Tip: One of the quickest ways to make the controls in New 'n' Tasty a little easier is by switching on the two 'old school' control toggles, which are off by default. These tighten up Abe's movement and make lateral hops much easier to pull off.

Once on, Abe will no longer run without the player pressing the 'run' button, and will hop to the side rather than straight up, making mines easier to leap over and distances easier to judge.

Re-mapping the controls:


New 'n' Tasty supports in-game remapping for controllers and keyboards.

To remap a controller, ensure the "Input Method" is set to Controller, and then go to "Button Layout" and select "Xbox 360" at the top to bring up a dropdown. From the dropdown, select "Custom" and then remap as needed.

Supported controllers:


Windows: Xbox 360; Xbox One; DualShock 4, Steam Controller; Logitech F310, F510, F710; XInput compatible. Others may be configured via in-game remapping tool. Please refer to minimum specs for other formats.


關於此遊戲

Back To Oddworld


Explore ancient ruins, dodge carnivorous beasts and avoid trigger-happy guards as Abe, the original Oddworld hero in this lovingly recrafted, built from the ground-up and totally recooked take on the classic adventure Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee.

Once a happy floor waxer in Oddworld's biggest meat processing plant, Abe stumbles across his boss's secret plan to turn the factory's slave labor force into the latest in the RuptureFarms Tasty Treats line of novelty meat snacks. Abe now has to save his own skin from the grinders, but simply escaping the flesh farm is only the start of his Oddysee - for many dangers await Abe on his journey to discover his destiny.

Built from scratch from the ground up, enjoy new breathtaking visuals, enhanced audio and improved, deeper gameplay as New 'n' Tasty reignites the original Oddworld game using the latest next-generation technology.

Amazing new graphics


With art direction from series creator Lorne Lanning, Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty offers a view into Oddworld with fidelity never seen before. Fluid animation, new free-moving cameras and high resolution (up to 4K) visuals make RuptureFarms and the surrounding areas look incredible, creating the Oddworld that Lanning always wanted to see.

Revamped controls


Analog controls offer more subtle control over Abe, and new tricks like free aiming, the ability to drop grenades behind you and also sneak whilst crouching open up new avenues for stealthy tactics and inventive speed-running. Optional 'Old School' controls bring back hopping and digital movement too, so the Oddysee purists can get started with some familiarity.

Brand new areas, brand new secrets


From the murky grime of RuptureFarms to the expansive native lands of the Monsaic Lines, through to the vast temples of Scrabania and Paramonia, Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty boasts new areas, subtle gameplay changes and a few surprises. Fans will recognise the huge meat grinders, Scrab holding pens and cavernous caves, but there's more than enough that's new here to keep you on your toes.

Update 14

Latest updates:


- Higher quality pre-rendered cut-scenes
- Fixes to camera inversion and targeting during real-time cut-scenes
- A few new 'HD' character models
- audio quality improved
- sound effects from Munch's Oddysee HD added
- brightness adjusted on first boot to better match Xbox version
- video player now uses the original 4:3 aspect ratio


關於此遊戲

New port for 2016


We've reported the game for 2016, which now runs at 60 FPS, includes higher resolution textures, better quality cut-scenes, improved audio, higher poly models, numerous fixes and improvements, and trading cards, badges, emotes and backgrounds!

About the game


Players guide Mudokon champion Abe, and his aquatic Gabbit partner Munch, in Oddworld's third adventure, using special psychic powers, cool power-ups, and other special abilities to deliver payback as they reclaim the last gabbit eggs on Oddworld, which have been packaged in a can of gabbiar.

Key features:

  • Play as a team - players use Munch and Abe cooperatively to make their way through the trials of Oddworld. Leverage both characters' unique strengths:
  • Abe- Abe can climb and jump to reach new areas, and then run to escape from dangerous enemies. When all else fails, chant to take control of the enemy's soul, and use their guns to clear a path to safety.
  • Munch - Munch can swim around the new realms of Oddworld. When on the ground, zip along with a wheelchair power up. Need to move some yapping Slogs out of the way? Just use Munch's nifty remote control head port to fire up the crane and drop those Sloggies in their pen.
  • Special psychic powers - Munch and Abe's psychic powers can extend their reach and get others to do the dirty work:
  • As Abe - Let Abe's chant roar to take possession of a gun-toting Big Bro Slig and clear almost anything out of the way. Abe can use spooce or spiritual power gained byharvesting SpooceShrubs to posses other creatures as well, but why think small?
  • As Munch - If Abe can't mesmerize someone into getting the job done, Munch can use his handy remote control head port to hijack nearby machines including cranes, and 50-caliber Anesthesia bots to tackle the really tough obstacles.
  • Power-Ups – Every friendly character you can find becomes a fighting ally, Fuzzles, Mudokons…. Need to get somewhere quickly or get over a wall, like right now? Use Oddworld's consumer power-ups like Expresso and Bounce to amp up Munch and Abe's abilities to perform cool moves. For the more direct approach, possess high-caliber weapon toting enemies.
  • Oddworld, now in "new and improved 3D!" - it's a whole new Oddworld, with lush rivers, towering mountains and hundreds of trees that bloom or die.
  • Interact with dozens of different oddball races - use GameSpeak® to get Oddworld's Inhabitants from the heavily armed Big Bro Sligs to the cute but ferocious Fuzzles) to carry out tricky tasks or just beat the crap out of enemies.
  • "Frustration Free" gaming - Oddworld's new intelligent cinematic camera, auto-targeting system and no-stick navigation system makes playing a breeze! Plus with easy
  • QuikSave® and limitless lives, players have plenty of chances to take on any situation…
    no matter how Odd!

關注焦點


關於此遊戲

Lead the revolution of the Orcs and Goblins!

In a world at war, the vast Empire of Men tries to extend its domination over the territories of the Orcs and Goblins, who are systematically persecuted, enslaved and massacred. Through this great role-playing game, lead a fearsome Orc warrior, and a Goblin master of assassination and stealth.

You have been appointed to fulfill an extremely dangerous mission, deep in enemy territory: to kill one man... the Emperor himself. Fight your way through a terribly hostile world to reach the objective of your quest. Level up, learn and develop powerful skills, and finally free your people from the yoke of the Empire!

column2: OKAMI HD / 大神 絶景版
column3:
甚具和風色彩以華美世界‧日本為舞台的感人活劇「大神」，將化為高解像度登場。
描繪得生動活潑的圖像，可以說完全吻合絕景之名，具氣息之美。
成為大神天照，與具魅力的登場人物們，在一個充滿熱情讓人心動的故事，及這片美麗的大自然上驅馳。
當迎接故事的終焉時，一定令你感動流涕⋯⋯。

本作由原作「大神」的原創畫面和同樣以4:3的遊戲開始、遊戲讀取時出現的迷你遊戲等都會復活。能夠一邊利用高解像度；一邊體驗近似以前遊戲的模式來進行！

Gold Edition

This amazing ONE PIECE BURNING BLOOD - Gold Edition includes the game along with all the content from the Wanted Pack, Wanted Pack 2!

  • 4 new playable characters

  • 6 alternate versions of playable characters

  • 14 costumes

  • 5 customized HUDs

  • + the exclusive Platinum Luffy costume
One Piece Burning Blood is a dynamic and colourful new fighting game featuring the world’s most famous pirate: Monkey D. Luffy.

GEAR UP FOR THE FIGHT!


關於此遊戲

《航海王 Burning Blood》是一款動態多彩的全新戰鬥遊戲，登場主角是全世界最知名的海賊：蒙其．D．魯夫。

  • 快節奏格鬥遊戲：準備迎接瘋狂招式和毀滅連擊！

  • 惡魔果實／霸氣能力：使用惡魔果實和「霸氣」發動大規模特殊招式，痛擊最凶猛的對手！

  • 3 vs. 3 組隊戰鬥：戰鬥期間隨時切換角色上場，發動驚人攻擊！

  • 豪華陣容：超過 40 個來自偉大的航道和各地的可操縱角色！

  • 史上最壯闊戰鬥：體驗激烈打鬥和過場動畫，重現馬林福特之戰！

魯夫和草帽海賊團的冒險即將推出 PC 版啦！

從一切旅程的起點，佛夏村，到邪惡的唐吉訶德·多佛朗明哥所掌管的神秘小島，德雷斯羅薩，如實呈現《航海王》的原版劇情。
你有堅定的決心，可以打敗多佛朗明哥和其他史上最危險的海賊嗎？
順著漫畫原版劇情，一一號召草帽海賊團的成員，隨後前往最經典的地點，展開史詩決鬥：海軍總部、美人魚島、冰火島和德雷斯羅薩！

《航海王：海賊無雙3》為各位玩家獻上許多振奮人心的改良及全新特色，包括：
  • 高畫質圖像與動畫：超忠實呈現《航海王》世界樣貌
  • 加入更多知名角色豐富劇情：薩波、多佛朗明哥、藤虎及更多角色！
  • 改良遊戲可玩性，推出全新協同動作（無線上合作模式）
  • KOEI TECMO GAMES 與 BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment 聯手推出《海賊無雙》系列有史以來動作最多的一款遊戲。

column2: One Piece Pirate Warriors 3 Story Pack

故事組合包內含 8 套服裝：娜美、妮可羅賓、托拉法爾加‧羅及其他更多你最愛的角色！
另含：8 種全新任務包，在《航海王：海賊無雙3》的世界展開更多冒險。

One Way Heroics Plus DLC - adding double the content!

Taking One Way Heroics to a new level, Plus adds almost double the content with new classes, enemies, features and more. Defeat the Demon Lord in a whole different dimension with this unmissable addition.
http://store.steampowered.com/app/352840/


關於此遊戲



In One Way Heroics, you take on the role of an intrepid adventurer who must travel across the land and face the Demon Lord before a mysterious shadow engulfs everything.

Darkness always approaches from the left, and with each movement or action you take, the void creeps ever closer. Forced to run right, you'll encounter any number of monsters, allies, thieves and shops on your desperate journey to stop the end of everything.

The good news is that you don't just have access to one world. You have access to all of them.



  • A nearly infinite number of worlds to save and explore!
  • Multiple classes to unlock, each with different skills and advantages.
  • Dimensional Vault: Don't waste extra valuables! Lock away your inventory and save it for your next run!
  • Time control: when the going gets tough, the tough freeze time and work out a new strategy.
  • Steam goodies: trading cards, emoticons and wallpapers that proudly broadcast your OWH finesse!

Every world is different and unique. Lust forests or corrupted hellscapes, adorable animals or cunning thieves, each departure is a roll of the die. You might find likeminded heroes willing to journey with you, or you might meet no one and be forced to venture into the unknown alone.

Like a dimension you previously visited? Simply input the name at the Dimensional selection screen before you begin your journey. Want to try your luck with a random reality? Type any word that pops into your head, and watch as One Way Heroics builds you a world based on the name you chose.

Infinite permutations. Infinite worlds. Infinite adventure.

*This game supports Cloud Saves for most system data including clear data and unlockables, however mid-game saves do not carry over.

切碎牠們，燒死牠們，串燒牠們，還有轟飛牠們 - 不管您的做法是哪種，一定要在 Robot Entertainment 所開發的這款科幻動作戰略遊戲殺死這些獸人。

身為一位手中握有數十把致命武器、法術以及陷阱的戰鬥法師（War Mage），在狂暴的獸以及暴走的獸人圍攻下守住 24 座要塞，包括了食人怪，地獄蝙蝠，當然，還有一大群醜不拉嘰的獸人。在劇情戰役模式中與敵人戰鬥來解鎖不同的難度選擇，包含了噩夢模式！

您是否想在一個岩漿坑裡頭烤獸人，用天花板當成陷阱把牠們壓扁，或冰起來在一劍擊碎牠們？不管選擇甚麼樣武器或陷阱，您必定會成為一位獸人屠夫！

遊戲特色

  • 守住 24 座要塞 – 蜿蜒的通道、高聳的高塔以及廣闊開放的會場都需要一位戰鬥法師來守住它們
  • 6 種殺傷力強大的武器與咒語 – 從努弓、刃杖到魔法元素，任君挑選
  • 19 種致命的陷阱與頑強的嘍羅 – 選擇各式各樣的陷阱，像是箭牆、釘刺陷阱、旋轉刀刃、燃燒的硫磺或是尋求同盟的協助來抵擋獸人部落的侵襲
  • 11 種獨一無二的敵人 – 包含食人魔、地獄蝙蝠，當然，還有一大群醜不拉嘰的獸人
  • 劇情故事戰役 – 連續 3 章抵擋獸人無情的波擊並探索故事背後神秘的力量
  • 耐久的升級制度 – 透過戰役模式解開更多更棒的陷阱
  • 廣泛的耐玩度 – 「噩夢模式」還有骷顱升級模式來延長遊戲體驗
  • 計分系統以及排行榜 – 與您的朋友一起競爭最佳獸人殺手的稱號！

column2: Orwell: Keeping an Eye On You
column3:
Season 2 Announced: Ignorance is Strength

Check out the store page for more information...

http://store.steampowered.com/app/633060/Orwell_Ignorance_is_Strength/


關於此遊戲

老大哥来了——那个人就是你。调查市民的生活，找出恐怖袭击的凶手。来自网络，社交，私人文件的信息全部都可为你敞开。但是请注意，你提供的这些信息也许会有后果……


奥威尔是政府新型安保程序，拥有可以调查这个国家所有网络信息的能力。它可以监控所有的个人社交信息以及任何的电脑。为了保护市民的隐私，研究员会检查奥威尔找出的数据，并挑选出哪些应该上交给安保部门。

从上千个候选人中挑选出来的，你是奥威尔第一个研究员。当恐怖袭击影响到国家首都Bonton时，奥威尔和你需要马上进行测试。从一个人嫌疑人开始，你要帮助安保部门建立一个潜在嫌疑人的档案网络。

但是这些人真的就是恐怖分子吗？你要向奥威尔揭露的信息中是如何说的？如果你发现了连他们最爱的人都不知道的信息呢？国家寻求的所谓的维持治安真正的代价又是什么？

游戏特点

调查市民的数字生活
搜索网页，社交网络，交友网站资料，新的文章和博客等等来寻找看恐怖袭击的凶手。

入侵嫌疑人的私生活
窃听语音对话，翻阅个人邮件，骇入电脑，查找医疗记录，寻找联系。找到你需要知道的信息。

决定应该揭露的信息
安保部门只会看到你提供的信息，并付诸行动。你来决定什么应该被看到，什么不应该，你影响着嫌疑人的感觉。

确保国民的安全
找到恐怖分子国民才能睡得安稳，知道奥威尔在照看着他们。

成人内容警告
请注意，奥威尔包括成人语言以及有关成人的主题，不适合青少年玩家。

你將扮演 Cutter Slade 這名通過無限試煉的正宗菁英戰士，用無限自由度探索 Adelpha 星。暢遊這個充滿奇幻與科學的浩瀚世界，探索異星城市、對抗兇猛敵人，並發掘超先進文明世界的秘密。在這個系統化的動態世界做出正確抉擇，這兩個宇宙的命運就端看你的成敗了。

機會無限

透過上百個精采任務 Outcast – Second Contact 的浩瀚世界呈現史詩般的冒險。
  • 在這個廣大開放世紀中，開始一場自由度極高的冒險。
  • 任意選擇各種任務，依照自己的步調過關斬將。
  • 在熱血戰鬥中正面迎擊 Talan 外星人或玩卡牌。
  • 精通軍火庫各項多元武器和高科技裝備，按照戰鬥情勢改變作戰策略.
  • 改變 Adelpha星各大勢力的均衡。Outcast – Second Contact以動態世界為背景，你的一舉一動都會對整個生態系統造成直接且巨大的影響。

動態星球

踏上 Adelpha 星的奇幻旅程，一個充斥奇特生物和定居一群先進 Talan 外星人的綺麗世界。
  • 你可以用步行方式或站在 Twôn-Ha 的肩膀，深入一個人類未知的廣大土地，探索 6 個不同的大陸。
  • 在你適應外星文明文化的同時，你將會深入 Talan 社群的核心：與 Riss 商人打交道、與叛軍進行談判，或遵循偉大 Shamaz 人的神秘習俗。
  • 在這個引人入勝的世界中，每次對戰和每個事件都會揭開一連串的冒險。

生死任務

近期人類發現他們不再是宇宙中的唯一文明，甚至屈居劣勢 universeS。嗚呼哀哉，美國政府派出一台探測號卻被一群 Adelpha 星原住民摧毀，這場與超智慧人類的第一類接觸簡直是慘不忍睹。這個事件造成的一場能源災難據說會摧毀地球。你將扮演海豹突擊隊隊員 Cutter Slade，派遣到 Adelpha 星上尋找探測號並加以修復，才能避免這場毀滅性災難的發生。“Ulukai” 是古代預言的救世主，受到當地原住民的歡迎，你將會發現 Adelpha 星和地球的命運現在將牽動在一起。
  • 遊戲冒險時間超過 50個小時，搭配快節奏又多變的遊戲故事劇情。
  • 對抗嗜血的暴君，讓長期受到壓迫的人民重回自由。
  • 扮演 Cutter Slade 這個魅力無窮、直言不諱的英雄。

ULUKAÏ 再現

Outcast – Second Contact 大舉重制經典邪典遊戲。Outcast。這款 1999 年上市的遊戲曾獲得年度最佳冒險遊戲等超過 100 個大獎，成為電玩史上第一款 3D 開放世界遊戲，更是當代動作冒險遊戲的先驅。
  • Outcast 世界以現在繪圖技術大舉重制舊作。
  • 加入躲避、翻滾、衝刺和掩護系統等新動作，讓戰鬥更加動感十足。
  • 全新隱藏區最終揭開原作玩家對 Adelpha 星討論最熱烈的秘密

更新項目

Free Festive Seasoning update!



There’s nothing better than getting family and friends round for a seasonal shindig…except maybe flamethrowers. A yuletide reminder that Overcooked’s Festive Seasoning gives you both of those at once! Baste, chop, dice, roast, and possibly burn
that turkey for your guests in this free game update featuring eight new levels, two new chefs and two tasty recipes – all of which can be found on the main menu!


關於此遊戲



Overcooked is a chaotic couch co-op cooking game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow chefs must prepare, cook and serve up a variety of tasty orders before the baying customers storm out in a huff. Sharpen your knives and dust off your chef’s whites, there isn’t mushroom for error and the steaks are high in these crazy kitchens! 

The Onion Kingdom is in danger and only the finest cooking can save it! In Overcooked players must journey through a variety of cruel and unusual kitchens on their quest to become master chefs capable of conquering an ancient edible evil which plagues the land.

Play solo or engage in classic, chaotic couch co-op for up to four players in both co-operative and competitive challenge modes. You’ll have to cook a range of different dishes and work together in order to become the most effective and ultimate team!

A CULINARY QUEST

The Onion Kingdom is a rich world full of cruel and unusual kitchens for you to conquer. Take part in an epic journey and tackle an increasingly challenging and bizarre gauntlet of kitchens which will push your skills of co-operation and co-ordination to the very limits. Each level brings a new challenge for you and your team to overcome, whether it's sliding around on a pirate ship, moving between speeding trucks, cooking on an ice floe or serving food in the bowels of a fiery underworld, each level will test the mettle of even the bravest chefs. 

SIMPLE CONTROLS/DEEP CHALLENGE

Overcooked is so easy to pick up that anyone can join in the fun, but finding a team who can communicate and co-ordinate their actions when the pizza hits the fan, that's when only a well-oiled team of super-chefs will come out on top! 

DIFFERENT WAYS TO PLAY

Whether indulging in deep fried local co-op or sautéed single player, as you play through the game you'll unlock new levels, new chef characters and even competitive challenge levels which allow teams of two to engage in hard boiled head-to-head in the kitchen.

However you want to play, if you think you can stand the heat, then get ready to enter the kitchen!

Steam 獨家預購優惠

Pre-purchase exclusive offer -

Artbook and Minion Hat redemption:

You can check if you have the art book which will be in the game directory -
The Default path for Artbook redemption is C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\OverlordFOE

The hats are available for free from the vendor in the game's central hub (Grubb)


關於此遊戲

Step into the warped fantasy world of Overlord: Fellowship of Evil, the dark and twisted Action RPG filled with the series’ signature black humour. Penned by award-winning original Overlord scriptwriter Rhianna Pratchett, Overlord: Fellowship of Evil delivers an epic new quest featuring four Netherghūls – undead servants of the dark arts, resurrected in the absence of a true Overlord, to bring evil back to a world overrun by the forces of good.

Assisting gamers once again are the mighty, maniacal and occasionally moronic minions, ready to unleash their charmingly chaotic brand of destruction and led by Gnarl, their wise old master, voiced, as before, by actor Marc Silk.

Embark on a brand new Overlord adventure in single-player or with up to three friends in local and online single-screen co-op. Filled with fun combat and twisted fantasy tales, Overlord: Fellowship of Evil invites players to dive into an Action RPG where it’s good to be bad, but it’s GREAT to be evil.

Overlord is the only series that actively encourages players to have fun being the embodiment of evil, destroying all that is good in a subversive, comedic manner. Fellowship of Evil captures this essence and adds in four-way, chaotic co-op play where gamers can even turn on each other. Evil always finds a way...sometimes it just needs a bit of a nudge.

Key Features

  • Series signature dark, mischievous humour Award-winning scriptwriter Rhianna Pratchett returns with a twisted and hilarious tale of evil, chaos, Minions and the burning desire to destroy all things good!
  • Develop your minions! They’re back! Our cruel critters return. Call upon your minions in battle and build them into dedicated devils to do your destructive bidding. “For the Master!”
  • Invade. Smite. Loot! Work your way through the Netherworld and unleash hell on the world above! Trample the weak under your evil size 10s with fun and satisfying combat, combining unique abilities and melee attacks to dominate all who stand before you! Share loot or steal the spoils- how far are you willing to go in the Trials of Evil?
  • Four times the players, four times the fun! Evil has a new face. Well, four faces, actually. But who wears the evilist? Er, eviler? You decide! Pick from any of four distinct Netherghul characters, each with unique abilities. Play as a team, or screw each other over – evil never plays by the rules!

數位豪華版

The Deluxe Edition:
Included in the Deluxe Edition are 5 In-game historical monuments from around the world, the games original soundtrack as well as a digital art book.

Five in-game items include:

  • Statue of Liberty
  • Eiffel Tower
  • Brandenburg Gate
  • Arc de Triomphe
  • Grand central terminal

Original Soundtrack:

This Original Soundtrack includes 14 unique tracks mixed from the ambient music of the game, allowing you to enjoy the wonderful music whenever you want.

Digital Art book:

See the concepts behind the buildings! The book features almost a 32 hand drawn concepts of the game various buildings and the story behind each.


Gaming in the Real World

Cities: Skylines is one of the featured game in the Gaming in the Reality documentary. Get the documentary here! - http://store.steampowered.com/app/528590


關於此遊戲

Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience.

From the makers of the Cities in Motion franchise, the game boasts a fully realized transport system. It also includes the ability to mod the game to suit your play style as a fine counter balance to the layered and challenging simulation. You’re only limited by your imagination, so take control and reach for the sky!

Multi-tiered and challenging simulation

Constructing your city from the ground up is easy to learn, but hard to master. Playing as the mayor of your city you’ll be faced with balancing essential requirements such as education, water electricity, police, fire fighting, healthcare and much more along with your citys real economy system. Citizens within your city react fluidly, with gravitas and with an air of authenticity to a multitude of game play scenarios.

Extensive local traffic simulation

Colossal Order's extensive experience developing the Cities in Motion series is fully utilized in a fully fleshed out and well-crafted local traffic simulation.

Districts and Policies

Be more than just an administrator from city hall. Designating parts of your city as a district results in the application of policies which results in you rising to the status of Mayor for your own city.

Utilize the Day and Night Cycle

The city changes during the hours of the day and affects citizen schedules. Traffic is visibly slower at night and some zoned areas do not work with full efficiency. This expansion will put you in control of managing the different aspects of the day and night cycles.

Extensive modding support

Build or improve on existing maps and structures. You can then import them into the game, share them as well as download the creations of other city builders on the Steam workshop.

更新項目

Play Party Hard while you livestream it, and have your audience mess with your game!

  • Twitch viewers can influence in-game events
  • Twitch viewers can control NPCs, live in-game
  • Allow your fans to help you.... or completely mess up your game!
  • Aliens, sharknados, SWAT, party people, killer bears, and more!


    關於此遊戲

    NOW WITH LOCAL CO-OP! In Party Hard, you play as someone who is really tired of their neighbours having loud parties. Instead of calling the police, you decide it’s a better idea to take everyone down using your faithful knife and the environment. The story of this tactical strategy follows a series of killings at parties throughout the USA.

    The developers used to work mostly on casual, family-friendly games until they participated in a game jam, making the first prototype for Party Hard. TinyBuild backed up the original authors, Pinokl Games, to create a full version that is now on Steam!

    Party Hard has semi-procedurally generated environments and focuses on unique ways of killing people. In the greatest traditions of stealth games, your main goal is not to get caught while silently picking off unsuspecting victims one by one. Dancing and blending in in a suspicious situation is key.


    • A (not)serious story that follows a series of murders throughout the USA
    • 19 unique levels with random variations on each one
    • Use traps, cause explosions, become a ninja
    • Multiple unlock-able characters
    • Local co-op multiplayer
    • Special random events, like a bear coming in and killing everyone for you
    • Trigger the DEA, SWAT, paramedics or firefighters to come and ruin the party

    5 Playable Characters!


    • The guy who wants to get some sleep
    • The ninja who is fast, stealthy, has a smoke bomb, but shouldn't be seen
    • The cop who can carry bodies around without suspicion, and frame innocent people
    • The girl who can knock people out
    • The butcher who has a chainsaw

    Play the game live on Twitch and let your viewers impact what's happening!


    Yes, you can let your Twitch viewers mess with you while you’re playing Party Hard. They can cause all sorts of chaos like inviting more people to the party, calling in special forces, bringing Sharknados, and more!

column2: Pillars of Eternity - The White March Part I
column3:
Expansion Pass

Pillars of Eternity: Expansion Pass contains both The White March: Part I and Part II for a rebated price. The White March Part II automatically becomes available to Expansion Pass owners as soon as it is released this Winter.


關於此遊戲

Pillars of Eternity: The White March - Part I is a large sprawling expansion pack with hours of gameplay integrated into the main adventure. Along with the new quests and area content, the team at Obsidian continues to support and make improvements to the entire game, including the additions of Player Party AI and Enhanced Enemy AI. Even if you haven't played Pillars of Eternity, now is a great time to jump in and experience the hardcore classic RPG with The White March - Part I.

Main features
  • Raised level cap: Your party of six adventurers can now progress beyond level 12 to 14. The additional levels add powerful new spells, abilities and talents for all 11 classes.
  • New areas to explore: Largely focused on the snowy environments inspired by Icewind Dale, the expansion will feature a new quest hub, and many additional quests and dungeons.
  • Soulbound weapons: The expansion features mighty artifacts that grow stronger over time. These weapons gain different powers and attributes depending on the character class that binds to it.
  • New companions: Part 1 of the expansion introduces two new companions you will be able to use throughout all of your adventures. The Devil of Caroc, a rogue, and Zahua, a monk, will be available to join you on your quest in The White March and will travel back with you into the base game.
  • Multi-class talents: Classes will now have additional options to diversify and take on some of the abilities of other classes.
  • Party AI: Now you will have the option to set AI scripts for your party, allowing you to focus on controlling the characters you care about most.
  • Enhanced Enemy AI: Enemies and monsters are now smarter than ever. The new AI makes the entire game more of a challenge, and spell casters will use a wider variety of their spells in more devastating ways.
  • Respec: At any inn or tavern the player can re-level their party members. It gives flexibility for the player to experiment with the RPG systems and try out builds with the newly added multi-class talents. If you aren't completely satisfied with your character, you can now do a rebuild and start over fresh.

在 PSN 上廣受好評的 PixelJunk™ Eden 已經游向 Steam ！
針對 PC 所重新設計的控制方式以及擁有新功能的譜，PixelJunk™ Eden 將給您全新的感受，即使您在 PS3 上已經是一個熟練的老手。
在這個生氣蓬勃的有機生物世界中巨大的「花園」中，利用搖擺、跳躍及攀爬的方式，來成為一個難以捉摸的譜，並尋找每個關卡中小而敏捷的「Grimp」。騎乘在您所成長的巨型植物下，揮動它們，破壞它們的花粉，並讓它們徘徊在這個日益增長、喧囂的世界。
從大砲中發射，在這個零重力的世界下，被風的吹拂而去拼命的抓住葉子，來通過這迷霧的世界。每個花園都有一系列獨特的挑戰，謎題和敵人都將激發您的頭腦！
由獨立製作多媒體藝術家 Baiyon 所製作出的和諧與獨特的繪畫風格以及細膩的原聲音樂， Eden 將會讓您體驗到其他遊戲所無法感受到的。

遊戲特色：

  • 由獨立音樂家及藝術家 Baiyon 所製作出的引人入勝和和諧的音樂。
  • 可以遊玩「Encore」擴展包中的全新的15個關卡。
  • 針對滑鼠而重新設計的控制方式。
  • 一個全新的功能「Quick Warp」：如果您發現它們跌落得太遠，可以讓您回復到最後它們最後一次跳躍的位置。
  • 全新改進的功能「Continue」：您現在可以在任何的階段來開始遊玩過去的譜。
  • 更多新的樂趣的成就新增到您的 Steam 成就系統的清單！

Plague Inc: Evolved 獨到地將高策略性及驚人寫實的模擬兩者合而為一。您的病原體剛才感染了「零號病人」，現在您必須演化出致命的全球規模瘟疫，同時面對人類為了自我防禦所做的一切措施加以因應調適，讓人類歷史劃下句點。

Plague Inc. 極其逼真，甚至連 CDC 都曾經邀請開發人員，當面討論遊戲中的感染模式！http://blogs.cdc.gov/publichealthmatters/2013/04/plague-inc/

目前已有超過 6500 萬名玩家受到 Plague Inc. 感染，接下來 Plague Inc: Evolved 更將飽受讚譽的原創遊戲體驗結合以個人電腦的重大全新特色，包括多人遊戲、支援使用者所產生的內容、提升圖形和其他許多效果，不一而足。



  • 10 個不同病種 – 精通每種病原體，從細菌到生化武器、心靈控制到殭屍，想盡辦法滅絕人類 – 不同病種所需的方針彼此大相徑庭。
  • 20 種獨特情境 – 您可調整自己的策略；情境能為您的流行病創造進一步的挑戰 – 您該如何處理豬瘟的新病株，或是怎樣感染處於冰河時期的世界呢？
  • 超級寫實的世界 – 針對真實世界設計策略、先進 AI，加上採取真實數據與事件，使得 Plague Inc: Evolved 成為終結世界之病原體的真實模擬，甚至也受到 CDC 的青睞！
  • 競爭性的多人遊戲 - 世界受到兩場瘟疫的肆虐已夠不幸，您又如何能夠打敗對手，贏得基因優勢之戰呢？玩家能拿到全新進化、能力與基因，協助對抗全球掌控，並且摧毀對手！
  • 合作模式 - 兩種不同疾病並肩齊行，感染並且摧毀世界，不過人類也正著手以新的技法大力反擊！快與夥伴密切合作，使用全新基因、特性與策略，擊垮全球的療法實驗室，免得被他們根除。
  • 感染性內容創造者 - 衝進實驗室發展自己的客製情境 - 創造新的瘟疫類型、世界與遊戲內的事件。有精湛的工具可支援使用者所產生的內容，讓玩家體現最致命的創意，分享到 Steam Workshop。目前已有超過 10,000 種自訂情境發布 - 永遠有新的感染對象！
  • 令人目眩神迷的圖形 - 全 3D 疾病模型，讓您空前地近距離檢視自己創造的瘟疫，城市監視器能從街路的層次顯現人類的掙扎情形，人體掃描器更能分器官逐一地點出您所導致突變的充分效果。
  • 致命數據 - 統計資料與圖形讓您過足高科技的癮頭，您可監視感染與死亡程度，追蹤政府的反應與治療措施，接著還可再用全程遊戲重播檢視瘟疫的成果（或失敗）。
  • 另有豐富精彩內容... - 包括快速運行、超級殘忍困難度及基因改造... 外加眾多新病種與情境，將於未來（免費！）更新中問世。

歡慶《雲霄飛車之星》滿一歲，免費的 1.4 版週年更新來了！這次的更新將為您送上關卡編輯器、五個新的遊樂設施、新的景物物件、管理功能及使用者介面改良，以及更多內容！

Planet Coaster® – 雲霄飛車遊樂園模擬遊戲的明日之星來了！打造你的雲霄飛車遊樂園帝國，為數量驚人的遊客們帶來驚喜、歡樂和刺激。盡情發揮你的創意，並將成就分享給全世界。



點滴建造：在 Planet Coaster 裡每個人都是設計師。鋪設道路、建造景物、自行設計遊樂設施，利用上千種獨特的建築零件一點一滴地建造，讓你的遊樂園獨一無二。

塑造地景：隨心所欲地操縱自然景觀，改造你腳下的土地。透過地景塑造，你可以堆出高山、塑造湖泊、挖鑿山洞，甚至建造空中島嶼，並讓雲霄飛車在你的遊樂園地表上下蜿蜒穿行。

栩栩如生：你可以改造你最愛的遊樂設施，也可以拋棄一切現實世界的規則。不論你喜歡哪種方式，最逼真的遊樂設施和遊客反應都使 Planet Coaster 成為史上最栩栩如生的模擬遊戲。



進化的模擬體驗：遊戲史上最深入的模擬樂園遊戲讓你越磨練技術收穫越多，經營起來更有意思。掌握遊客體驗的每個面向，並能馬上看到你的各種決定如何影響 Planet Coaster 世界。

生氣蓬勃的世界：遊樂園的每位遊客都是活潑生動的個體，會依照各自的興趣與渴望來探索你的遊樂園並產生感想。觀察 Planet Coaster 遊客們的感想，就能知道你的遊樂園經營得如何。

遊樂園經營管理：你能親手掌握各種易於使用的控制功能，暢快經營遊樂園。你可以在一系列的創意關卡中測試你的技巧，也可以單純好玩地建造遊樂園，改造你的遊樂園為遊客帶來驚喜、歡樂和刺激。



創意共同體：Planet Coaster 透過 Steam 工作坊社群中心將全世界的雲霄飛車迷和作者串連起來。你可以和其他玩家交流景物、雲霄飛車，甚至是整個遊樂園，為你的遊樂園注入全世界最張狂的創意。

獲得他人啟發：每天都能探索世界一流雲霄飛車遊樂園作者們所推出的最新創作，瀏覽並下載你最愛作者的創作內容，或是挑選由 Planet Coaster 開發團隊精選出的最新設計。

分享你的創意：不論你打造出的是豪華冰淇淋店還是世上最刺激的雲霄飛車，只要為它命名就能和全世界分享。加入作者社群，就有機會在世界各地的遊樂園裡看到你的設計。

Plantera中，您建立自己的花園，並且看著花園中的新植物，灌木，樹木和動物成長。
當您建立並且擴展您的花園時，您會吸引圓滾滾的藍色生物小幫手們，它們將幫您撿果子，收成您的植物。

如果您願意，您可以自己摘樹果子，撿植物果實，或者在您觀察、建立並購買新植物時讓您的小幫手們為您工作。 小幫手們在您不在遊戲時甚至會繼續幫您工作，當您回到遊戲時就會有些新的金幣等著您！

最好保持警戒，因為有時候一些小動物會侵入你的花園。 您可以親自找出他們或購買看門狗維持秩序。

提升等級來解鎖您的植物，灌木，樹木和動物，並繼續擴展和改善您的花園！

絕地求生(PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS)是大逃殺類型的遊戲，每一局遊戲將有100名玩家參與，
他們將被投放在絕地島(battlegrounds)的上空，遊戲開始跳傘時所有人都一無所有。
遊戲展開的方式是：玩家赤手空拳地分佈在島嶼的各個角落，利用島上多樣的武器與道具。
隨著時間的流逝，島上的安全地帶越來越少，特定地區也會發生爆炸的情況，最終只有一人存活獲得勝利。
遊戲的每一局比賽都會隨機轉換安全區，這樣玩家的很新鮮與緊張感會更加強烈。

PLAYERUNKNOWN (Brendan Greene – 目前為Bluehole Creative Director ) 是大逃殺類游戲的開拓者。
他在ARMA2初次展現大逃殺模式，他的大逃殺模式成為ARMA系列與H1Z1:King of the Kill的基礎。
現在， 他為了開發真正的大逃殺遊戲而在藍洞(Bluehole)開發絕地求生 (PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS)。

NOT JUST A GAME, THIS IS BATTLE ROYALE。
(這不僅是遊戲，是大逃殺 。)

16 年前，Newport Falls 市開始被犯罪集團 IMPERIO 所掌控。這個集團的成員讓這個風光明媚的城市蔓延著恐懼與不安。長久以來，警方對該勢力束手無策，這也使得IMPERIO 得以為所欲為。直到足智多謀的員警 John Croft 出現，他與所屬的專案小組，慢慢一步一步地制止了這個犯罪集團的行動。但就在他要逮捕集團的首腦前，他和專案小組突然失去音訊。後來身為英雄和小男孩父親的 John Croft 很快地被發現胸口身中兩槍死亡。但這案件一直都沒有破案。IMPERIO 也跟著消失，城市又開始蓬勃發展。

16 年後，在沒有任何預警下，IMPERIO 再度重返，並讓整個市區充斥著犯罪活動。其中難以置信的是在市長所舉行的大型市政宴會中，正當市長在進行他的打擊犯罪對策演說時，一名不明人士開槍射殺了市長。整個場地子彈四處飛射，到處都是破碎的玻璃和驚恐的群眾。現場所看到的是，市長倒臥在地，躺在他旁邊的是為了拯救他，付出生命全身布滿彈孔的警察局長 Michael Reese。兇手則逃離現場行蹤不明。

在 POLICE TACTICS: IMPERIO 中，您將扮演 Harvey Croft 並接下警察局長的職缺。您要負責維護 Newport Falls 市的法律和秩序。協調管轄區的緊急車輛和人員，並制止犯罪。確保沒有不受制裁的犯罪行為和罪犯！您就是打擊犯罪的第一道防線。您必須阻止犯罪橫行，及時揪出犯罪集團的禍首。收集並檢驗包羅萬象的證據，保護您的城市不要陷入犯罪的泥沼。充分發揮警察部隊的潛力。訓練和部署犯罪現場調查員、特種部隊、員警及警探。管理好您的總部並充分利用預算，確保執行法律和防範風險的最高標準。

隨著成功打擊犯罪集團的次數增加，您將會被付託更重大的責任和解開新的地區、部隊和強化功能。不斷地破解刺激的刑案、調查命案和預防罪行的發生。您能夠完成父親未完的職志，將 IMPERIO 徹底的瓦解嗎？

POLICE TACTICS: IMPERIO 是一款由 CyberphobX Ltd. 和 astragon Entertainment GmbH 所開發的擬真即時戰略遊戲。

遊戲特色：

  • 維護 Newport Falls 市的法律和秩序
  • 打擊犯罪集團
  • 協調不同的警察部隊
  • 逐步解開管轄區、強化功能和新部隊
  • 管理並改進您的總部和部隊
  • 擬真的美國或德國的警察部隊的緊急車輛
  • 動態晝夜循環場景
  • 擬真的警察廣播電臺和警笛聲

《傳送門 2》用創新的遊戲內容、故事以及最初《傳送門》那贏得超過 70 項以上業界獎項般的配樂打造出另一個大獎贏家的繼承者。

《傳送門 2》的單人遊戲部分帶來充滿活力的新角色、一大堆新鮮的解謎元素，以及更大、更加曲折的測驗室。玩家將可以於前所未見的光圈科學實驗室中探索，並且與在原遊戲中導引你，偶爾想要把你殺掉的電腦陪伴者 GLaDOS 重逢。

本遊戲的雙人合作模式將有其獨立的戰役內容，包含獨特的故事、測驗室，以及兩名新的玩家角色。這項新的遊戲模式讓玩家必須重新思考所有他們在《傳送門》中所了解到的事實。想要過關不只要一起行動，還必須一起思考。

遊戲特色
  • 豐富的單人遊戲：次世代的遊戲內容與令人注目的故事劇情。
  • 完整雙人合作模式：多人連線內容具有其額外的故事、角色，以及遊戲內容。
  • 進階物理系統：創造出前所未見的新領域，帶來更加有趣的挑戰，規模更大但不會更難的遊戲。
  • 原創音樂。
  • 大作續集：全球超過 30 個媒體雜誌將初代《傳送門》選為 2007 年度遊戲。
  • 編輯工具：包含《傳送門 2》地圖編輯工具。備註：上市後的更新才釋出。

特色列表

八十名玩家線上對決（最終目標百人大戰）
空降入場
火砲和空襲支援
有著真實砲塔轉速、裝甲厚度等數據的載具
基於軍事檔案和歷史地圖1:1還原的真實遊戲地圖
忠實還原歷史武器、載具和著名地標
建造基地、掩體和路障
通過後勤運輸鞏固陣地、提供補給
補給牽引系統
遊戲內置區域語音
玩家決定目標的沙盒遊戲模式
遊戲開發工具的完整使用權
支持Steam遊戲工坊



內容：

5張共計140平方公里的真實遊戲區域
3種遊戲模式，包括“進攻”、“謀略”和“沙盒”
超過50輛忠實再現的載具
超過50種真實武器
英軍和德軍陣營，包括第1空降師、第30軍、武裝親衛隊和國防軍
完整的1944年阿納姆西側近郊和包括了著名的“遙遠的橋”的阿納姆市中心
讓玩家可以增加或修改遊戲內容的開發工具

戰爭附言（Post Scriptum）是一款能為您帶來真實二戰作戰體驗的第一人稱模擬射擊類游戲。遊戲涵蓋了傘兵空降、基地建設、後勤運輸、大規模戰場以及專為玩家社群打造的特色遊戲模式等內容，並有著下至後勤車輛上到重型戰車的多樣化載具類型供你馳騁。



作為接觸一款遊戲的第一印象，我們認為‘浴血七橋’（The Bloody Seventh）這個簡約的名字充分概括了英國空降兵在等待他們的陸軍兄弟打通下萊茵河通路的過程中，歷經的慘烈血戰。

玩家將有機會成為英國空降師、第30軍或德國國防軍、武裝親衛隊的一員，在橫跨農場、林地、鄉鎮和市區的阿納姆戰役中體驗絕無僅有的激戰，而從航拍到街景的大量參考檔案讓我們能夠準確還原每個地區的地形地貌。無論是從飛機中一躍而出、開車為友軍運輸補給亦或是操縱各式戰車，你都能找到讓自己投身這個史無前例的二戰背景大型多人戰場環境的種種理由。

Live a week in the life of "The Postal Dude"; a hapless everyman just trying to check off some chores. Buying milk, returning an overdue library book, getting Gary Coleman's autograph, what could possibly go wrong?

Blast, chop and piss your way through a freakshow of American caricatures in this darkly humorous first-person adventure. Meet Krotchy: the toy mascot gone bad, visit your Uncle Dave at his besieged religious cult compound and battle sewer-dwelling Taliban when you least expect them! Endure the sphincter-clenching challenge of cannibal rednecks, corrupt cops and berserker elephants. Accompanied by Champ, the Dude's semi-loyal pitbull, battle your way through open environments populated with amazingly unpredictable AI. Utilize an arsenal of weapons ranging from a humble shovel to a uniquely hilarious rocket launcher.
Collect a pack of attack dogs! Use cats as silencers! Piss and pour gasoline on anything and everyone! YOU KNOW YOU WANT TO!

Orin, he who is silenced.



Orin was born in the Aki family, aristocratic Shirazs that were tightly bound to the service of Kazim, ruler of the northern kingdoms.
His father, Tarund Aki, was a stern man who never displayed any kind of appreciation towards his son. Like many others of his rank, he had been ordered by Kazim to wed a human spouse in order to try to father a child of Fate – a future Watcher. And like many others, he succeeded.

The kids that were born this way didn’t have a name for the first twenty years of their lives. They formed a coalition of strictly trained warriors, children fighters educated to reach excellency in all domains. Young or old, these units were called the Heralds of Dis. The Heralds were nameless ghosts under the direct orders of Kazim, and carried out his wishes with flawless efficiency. Bribery, poisoning and espionage for the youngest; diplomacy, direct murder and raids for the older ones.

The son of Tarund received an especially spartan schooling: his father didn’t tolerate failure or mistakes, and each misstep was punished by a cruel flogging. His child learned to strive for perfection as his body grew covered in scars. When he failed his first assassination, Tarund cut his left arm and waited for one full year before replacing it with a manasteel prosthesis.
To this day, the magical artifact still reacts to Orin’s Shiraz blood and burns his flesh – but his human heritage prevents the metal from killing him.


關於此遊戲



In the world of Thasys, most races rely on Mana to survive. This magical energy is now growing scarce, and wars for survival are devastating the lands as magical beings fight over the last remaining scraps of this life-giving force. Somewhere, legendary creatures sleep an ageless slumber, hiding in their hearts the original Mana source. Only a few chosen ones can awaken these Creatures and guide them to save Thasys. They are the witnesses of a dying world, the last hope for the living.
They are the PRODIGIES.




Prodigy Tactics is a tactical turn-based game set in a fantastic world of Thasys, torn in a never ending war. Create a team of heroes, the last hope for the dying world, and lead them to the victory fighting hand in hand with powerful Guardians. Every character is equipped with a unique set of abilities to aid allies in the battle or to vanquish their foes.

Battles in Prodigy Tactics consists of two teams facing each other on a classic arena. Each team can move freely on a 3x4 squares field, adjusting their tactic to the synergy of characters. While one side is preparing an attack, the other one sets the defense or counter-attack - making the game dynamic and engaging for both players at the time. Positioning becomes a key-component of the fights, as it can change the current target and affects the attack power.

There are two powerful forces in the Prodigy world: Harmony and Dissonance. Each one can be used by the Watchers and both bring the new quality to the battlefield.
Harmony brings balance and aids team in the battle, allowing them to gain power to cast their special abilities. At the end of the turn, if the Hero acts in Harmony, it creates a square filled with Mana.
Dissonance is a powerful and unpredictable force. It fills the creature using it with enormous power capable of destroying even the strongest foes.... But this force comes with a great responsibility as Dissonance is unstable. Beware, this force used without a proper caution leads to chaos.




  • Tactical, Turn-based Gameplay
  • range of unique playable characters to form a team with
  • beautifully designed, diverse arenas
  • 2 solo modes: training and bastion
  • online multiplayer against a random opponent or a friend

Tractors And Farm Machines Get Your Farm Up And Running

The PC simulator "Professional Farmer 2014" takes the player to the countryside and gives hobby farmers full control in the comfort of their home. Farm management, cultivating fields, planting crops, animal husbandry and buying and selling produce are just a few of the major game elements this simulator offers.

Starting out with a small estate, the player begins their career as an up-and-coming farmer and little by little acquires new fields, tractors, machines and animals, and can either specialize or make use of all options that farming has to offer. The key to success lies in good planning by season, expert knowledge that you acquire throughout the game, and skill and good old-fashioned hard work. As a farmer, the player learns to live with the forces of nature, accept the weather and respond so as to perfect the yield from fields, care for the animals and prepare the budget for new investments. Many tractors and farm machines (combine harvesters, field choppers, attaching parts and trailers, etc.) by renowned manufacturers are available to cultivate the farm and manage all the work. Only good planning and hard work will turn fallow earth into a flourishing and fertile soil. Of course, you can drive and control all machines yourself, be it hooking up the plough, re-filling the tractor or unloading the harvest.

"Professional Farmer 2014" has a broad variety of crops, depending on the environment and climate, with which the farmer can cultivate the fields diversely, effectively and with a high yield. Even crop rotation plays an important role in planning! The integrated seasons influence the game and provide the player with a constant stream of tasks and jobs.

The local farmers market is your first stepping-stone to success! After just a short time, you should take our home grown and harvested produce to the market and earn your first money by selling it. As you sell more, you will soon see more and larger machines in your fleet and be able to grow larger quantities of produce. Gradually, you will even be able to construct new buildings and acquire new fields.

Features

  • For the first time ever in a farming simulator: Different seasons and yearly planning
  • Countless original tractors
  • Campaign mode contains a plethora of missions for hours of engrossing fun. It has it all, from short tasks to extensive missions
  • Sandbox mode lets the hobby farmer enjoy the game without restrictions - no time pressure or to-do lists
